word.korean: 죄악을 행하는 자는 무지하뇨 저희가 떡 먹듯이 내 백성을 먹으면서 하나님을 부르지 아니하는도다
word.tagalog: Wala bang kaalaman ang mga manggagawa ng kasamaan? na siyang kumakain ng aking bayan na tila kumakain ng tinapay, at hindi nagsisitawag sa Dios.
word.maori: E kore ranei e mohio nga kaimahi i te kino? e kai nei i toku iwi, me te mea e kai taro ana; a kahore e karanga ki te Atua.
word.cebuano: Wala bay kahibalo ang mga mamumuhat sa kasal-anan, Nga nagalamoy sa akong katawohan ingon sa pagkaon nila sa tinapay, Ug wala sila mosangpit sa Dios?
word.hebrew: ד  כלו סג יחדו נאלחו    אין עשה-טוב אין גם-אחד
word.hebrewmodern: הלא ידעו פעלי און אכלי עמי אכלו לחם אלהים לא קראו׃
word.greekot: ὁ θεός εἰσάκουσον τῆς προσευχῆς μου ἐνώτισαι τὰ ῥήματα τοῦ στόματός μου

word.kjv: And they say, How doth God know? and is there knowledge in the most High?
word.thailand: และเขาทั้งหลายพูดว่า "พระเจ้าทรงทราบได้อย่างไร พระองค์ผู้สูงสุดมีความรู้หรือ"
word.spanish1909: Y dicen: ¿Cómo sabe Dios? ¿Y hay conocimiento en lo alto?
word.latinvulgate: Ut quid avertis manum tuam, et dexteram tuam de medio sinu tuo in finem ?
word.italian1927: e dice: Com’è possibile che Dio sappia ogni cosa, che vi sia conoscenza nell’Altissimo?
word.german1912: und sprechen: "Was sollte Gott nach jenen fragen? Was sollte der Höchste ihrer achten?"
word.french1910: Et il dit: Comment Dieu saurait-il, Comment le Très-Haut connaîtrait-il?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們說：“　神怎會曉得？至高者有知識嗎？”
word.korean: 말하기를 하나님이 어찌 알랴 지극히 높은 자에게 지식이 있으랴 하도다
word.tagalog: At kanilang sinasabi, Paanong nalalaman ng Dios? At may kaalaman ba sa Kataastaasan?
word.maori: E mea ana ratou, Ma te aha e matau ai te Atua? He matauranga koia to te Runga Rawa?
word.cebuano: Ug sila nagaingon: Unsaon sa pagkahibalo sa Dios? Ug aduna bay kahibalo ang Hataas Uyamut?
word.hebrew: יא  ואמרו איכה ידע-אל    ויש דעה בעליון
word.hebrewmodern: ואמרו איכה ידע אל ויש דעה בעליון׃
word.greekot: ἵνα τί ἀποστρέφεις τὴν χεῖρά σου καὶ τὴν δεξιάν σου ἐκ μέσου τοῦ κόλπου σου εἰς τέλος

word.kjv: He that chastiseth the heathen, shall not he correct? he that teacheth man knowledge, shall not he know?
word.thailand: พระองค์ผู้ทรงตีสอนบรรดาประชาชาติ พระองค์จะไม่ทรงขนาบหรือ พระองค์ผู้ทรงสอนความรู้ให้มนุษย์ พระองค์จะไม่ทรงทราบหรือ
word.spanish1909: El que castiga las gentes, ¿no reprenderá? ¿No sabrá el que enseña al hombre la ciencia?
word.latinvulgate: Quadraginta annis offensus fui generationi illi ; et dixi : Semper hi errant corde.
word.italian1927: Colui che castiga le nazioni non correggerà, egli che imparte all’uomo la conoscenza?
word.german1912: Der die Heiden züchtigt, sollte der nicht strafen, -der die Menschen lehrt, was sie wissen?
word.french1910: Celui qui châtie les nations ne punirait-il point, Lui qui donne à l'homme l'intelligence?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那管教萬國的，不施行審判嗎？那教導人的，自己沒有知識嗎？
word.korean: 열방을 징벌하시는 자 곧 지식으로 사람을 교훈하시는 자가 징치하지 아니하시랴
word.tagalog: Siyang nagpaparusa sa mga bansa, hindi ba siya sasaway, sa makatuwid baga'y siyang nagtuturo sa tao ng kaalaman?
word.maori: Ko te kaipapaki o nga iwi e kore ranei ia e papaki, ara ko te kaiwhakaako nei i te tangata kia mohio?
word.cebuano: Siya nga nagacastigo sa mga nasud, dili ba siya magabadlong, Bisan siya nga nagatudlo sa tawo ug kahibalo?
word.hebrew: י  היסר גוים הלא יוכיח    המלמד אדם דעת
word.hebrewmodern: היסר גוים הלא יוכיח המלמד אדם דעת׃
word.greekot: τεσσαράκοντα ἔτη προσώχθισα τῇ γενεᾷ ἐκείνῃ καὶ εἶπα ἀεὶ πλανῶνται τῇ καρδίᾳ καὶ αὐτοὶ οὐκ ἔγνωσαν τὰς ὁδούς μου

word.kjv: Teach me good judgment and knowledge: for I have believed thy commandments.
word.thailand: ขอทรงสอนคำตัดสินและความรู้แก่ข้าพระองค์ เพราะข้าพระองค์เชื่อถือพระบัญญัติของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Enséñame bondad de sentido y sabiduría; Porque tus mandamientos he creído.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Dammi buon senno e intelligenza, perché ho creduto nei tuoi comandamenti.
word.german1912: Lehre mich heilsame Sitten und Erkenntnis; den ich glaube deinen Geboten.
word.french1910: Enseigne-moi le bon sens et l'intelligence! Car je crois à tes commandements.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 求你把聰明和知識指教我，因為我信靠你的命令。
word.korean: 나의 고난을 보시고 나를 건지소서 내가 주의 법을 잊지 아니함이니이다
word.tagalog: Turuan mo ako ng mabuting kahatulan at kaalaman; sapagka't ako'y sumampalataya sa iyong mga utos.
word.maori: Whakaakona ahau ki te ngarahu pai, ki te matauranga: kua whakapono hoki ahau ki au whakahau.
word.cebuano: Tudloi ako sa maayong paghukom ug kinaadman;
word.hebrew: סו  טוב טעם ודעת למדני    כי במצותיך האמנתי
word.hebrewmodern: טוב טעם ודעת למדני כי במצותיך האמנתי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Such knowledge is too wonderful for me; it is high, I cannot attain unto it.
word.thailand: ความรู้อย่างนี้มหัศจรรย์เกินข้าพระองค์ สูงนัก ข้าพระองค์เอื้อมไม่ถึง
word.spanish1909: Más maravillosa es la ciencia que mi capacidad; Alta es, no puedo comprenderla.
word.latinvulgate: absconderunt superbi laqueum mihi, et funes extenderunt in laqueum ; juxta iter scandalum posuerunt mihi.
word.italian1927: Una tal conoscenza è troppo maravigliosa per me, tanto alta, che io non posso arrivarci.
word.german1912: Solche Erkenntnis ist mir zu wunderbar und zu hoch; ich kann sie nicht begreifen.
word.french1910: Une science aussi merveilleuse est au-dessus de ma portée, Elle est trop élevée pour que je puisse la saisir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 這樣的知識奇妙，是我不能理解的；高超，是我不能達到的。
word.korean: 이 지식이 내게 너무 기이하니 높아서 내가 능히 미치지 못하나이다
word.tagalog: Ang ganyang kaalaman ay totoong kagilagilalas sa akin; ito'y mataas, hindi ko maabot.
word.maori: He mea whakamiharo rawa, kei tawhiti atu hoki i ahau, tenei matauranga: kei runga noa atu, e kore e taea e ahau.
word.cebuano: Alang kanako katingalahan kining kinaadmana; Kini hataas, dili ako makakab-ut niini.
word.hebrew: ו  פלאיה (פליאה) דעת ממני    נשגבה לא-אוכל לה
word.hebrewmodern: פלאיה דעת ממני נשגבה לא אוכל לה׃
word.greekot: ἔκρυψαν ὑπερήφανοι παγίδα μοι καὶ σχοινία διέτειναν παγίδας τοῖς ποσίν μου ἐχόμενα τρίβου σκάνδαλον ἔθεντό μοι διάψαλμα

word.kjv: LORD, what is man, that thou takest knowledge of him! or the son of man, that thou makest account of him!
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ มนุษย์เป็นอะไรเล่าซึ่งพระองค์ทรงเอาพระทัยใส่เขา หรือบุตรของมนุษย์เป็นอะไรซึ่งพระองค์ทรงคิดถึงเขา
word.spanish1909: Oh Jehová, ¿qué es el hombre, para que de él conozcas? ¿O el hijo del hombre, para que lo estimes?
word.latinvulgate: Magnus Dominus, et laudabilis nimis ; et magnitudinis ejus non est finis.
word.italian1927: O Eterno, che cos’è l’uomo, che tu ne prenda conoscenza? o il figliuol dell’uomo che tu ne tenga conto?
word.german1912: HERR, was ist der Mensch, daß du dich sein annimmst, und des Menschen Kind, daß du ihn so achtest?
word.french1910: Eternel, qu'est-ce que l'homme, pour que tu le connaisses? Le fils de l'homme, pour que tu prennes garde à lui?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！人算甚麼，你竟關懷他，世人算甚麼，你竟眷念他。
word.korean: 여호와여, 사람이 무엇이관대 주께서 저를 알아주시며 인생이 무엇이관대 주께서 저를 생각하시나이까
word.tagalog: Panginoon, ano ang tao, upang iyong kilalanin siya? O ang anak ng tao, upang iyong pahalagahan siya?
word.maori: E Ihowa, he aha te tangata i maharatia ai ia e koe? Te tama ranei a te tangata i whakaaroa ai ia e koe?
word.cebuano: Oh Jehova, unsa ba ang tawo, nga ikaw nagmatinagdanon man kaniya? Kun ang anak sa tawo, nga ikaw nagpamalandong man kaniya?
word.hebrew: ג  יהוה--מה-אדם ותדעהו    בן-אנוש ותחשבהו
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה מה אדם ותדעהו בן אנוש ותחשבהו׃
word.greekot: μέγας κύριος καὶ αἰνετὸς σφόδρα καὶ τῆς μεγαλωσύνης αὐτοῦ οὐκ ἔστιν πέρας

word.kjv: To give subtilty to the simple, to the young man knowledge and discretion.
word.thailand: เพื่อให้ความหยั่งรู้แก่คนเขลา ให้ความรู้และความเฉลียวฉลาดแก่คนหนุ่ม
word.spanish1909: Para dar sagacidad á los simples, Y á los jóvenes inteligencia y cordura.
word.latinvulgate: ut detur parvulis astutia, adolescenti scientia et intellectus.
word.italian1927: per dare accorgimento ai semplici, e conoscenza e riflessione al giovane.
word.german1912: daß die Unverständigen klug und die Jünglinge vernünftig und vorsichtig werden.
word.french1910: Pour donner aux simples du discernement, Au jeune homme de la connaissance et de la réflexion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使愚蒙人變成精明，使少年人獲得知識和明辨的能力；
word.korean: 어리석은 자로 슬기롭게 하며 젊은 자에게 지식과 근신함을 주기 위한 것이니
word.tagalog: Upang magbigay ng katalinuhan sa musmos. Kaalaman at pagbubulay sa kabataan:
word.maori: Hei hoatu i te ngakau tupato ki nga kuware, i te matauranga, i te ngarahu pai ki te taitamariki;
word.cebuano: Sa paghatag ug salabutan sa mga walay-pagtagad, Alang sa batan-ong lalake ang kahibalo ug kabuot:
word.hebrew: ד  לתת לפתאים ערמה    לנער דעת ומזמה
word.hebrewmodern: לתת לפתאים ערמה לנער דעת ומזמה׃
word.greekot: ἵνα δῷ ἀκάκοις πανουργίαν παιδὶ δὲ νέῳ αἴσθησίν τε καὶ ἔννοιαν

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of knowledge: but fools despise wisdom and instruction.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นบ่อเกิดของความรู้ คนโง่ย่อมดูหมิ่นปัญญาและคำสั่งสอน
word.spanish1909: El principio de la sabiduría es el temor de Jehová: Los insensatos desprecian la sabiduría y la enseñanza.
word.latinvulgate: Timor Domini principium sapientiæ ; sapientiam atque doctrinam stulti despiciunt.
word.italian1927: Il timore dell’Eterno è il principio della scienza; gli stolti disprezzano la sapienza e l’istruzione.
word.german1912: Des HERRN Furcht ist Anfang der Erkenntnis. Die Ruchlosen verachten Weisheit und Zucht.
word.french1910: La crainte de l'Eternel est le commencement de la science; Les insensés méprisent la sagesse et l'instruction.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不受惡人的引誘敬畏耶和華是知識的開端，但愚妄人藐視智慧和教訓。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외하는 것이 지식의 근본이어늘 미련한 자는 지혜와 훈계를 멸시하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang takot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng kaalaman: nguni't ang mangmang ay humahamak sa karunungan at turo.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te wehi ki a Ihowa te timatanga o te matauranga; e whakahawea ana te whakaarokore ki te whakaaro nui, ki te ako.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova maoy sinugdan sa kahibalo; Apan ang mga buangbuang nagatamay sa kaalam ug pahamangno.
word.hebrew: ז  יראת יהוה ראשית דעת    חכמה ומוסר אוילים בזו
word.hebrewmodern: יראת יהוה ראשית דעת חכמה ומוסר אוילים בזו׃
word.greekot: ἀρχὴ σοφίας φόβος θεοῦ σύνεσις δὲ ἀγαθὴ πᾶσι τοῖς ποιοῦσιν αὐτήν εὐσέβεια δὲ εἰς θεὸν ἀρχὴ αἰσθήσεως σοφίαν δὲ καὶ παιδείαν ἀσεβεῖς ἐξουθενήσουσιν

word.kjv: How long, ye simple ones, will ye love simplicity? and the scorners delight in their scorning, and fools hate knowledge?
word.thailand: "คนเขลาเอ๋ย เจ้าจะรักความเขลาไปนานสักเท่าใด คนมักเยาะเย้ยจะปีติยินดีในการเยาะเย้ยนานเท่าใด และคนโง่จะเกลียดความรู้นานเท่าใด
word.spanish1909: ¿Hasta cuándo, oh simples, amaréis la simpleza, Y los burladores desearán el burlar, Y los insensatos aborrecerán la ciencia?
word.latinvulgate: Usquequo, parvuli, diligitis infantiam, et stulti ea quæ sibi sunt noxia cupient, et imprudentes odibunt scientiam ?
word.italian1927: "Fino a quando, o scempi, amerete la scempiaggine? fino a quando gli schernitori prenderanno gusto a schernire e gli stolti avranno in odio la scienza?
word.german1912: Wie lange wollt ihr Unverständigen unverständig sein und die Spötter Lust zu Spötterei und die Ruchlosen die Lehre hassen?
word.french1910: Jusqu'à quand, stupides, aimerez-vous la stupidité? Jusqu'à quand les moqueurs se plairont-ils à la moquerie, Et les insensés haïront-ils la science?
word.chinesencvtraditional: “你們愚蒙人喜愛愚蒙，好譏笑的人喜歡譏笑，愚昧人恨惡知識，要到幾時呢？
word.korean: 훤화하는 길 머리에서 소리를 지르며 성문 어귀와 성중에서 그 소리를 발하여 가로되
word.tagalog: Hanggang kailan kayong mga musmos, magsisiibig sa inyong kamusmusan? At ang mga nanunuya ay maliligaya sa panunuya, at ang mga mangmang ay mangagtatanim sa kaalaman?
word.maori: E te hunga kuware, kia pehea ake te roa o to koutou aroha ki te kuwaretanga? O te hiahia ranei o te hunga whakahi ki to ratou whakahi? O te whakakino ranei a te hunga wairangi ki te matauranga?
word.cebuano: Unsang kadugayon, kamo nga mga walay-pagtagad, nga higugmaon ninyo ang pagkawalay-pagtagad? Ug ang mga mayubiton mahimuot kanila sa pagyubit, Ug ang mga buang sa pagdumot sa kinaadman?
word.hebrew: כב  עד-מתי פתים--    תאהבו-פתי ולצים--לצון חמדו להם    וכסילים ישנאו-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: עד מתי פתים תאהבו פתי ולצים לצון חמדו להם וכסילים ישנאו דעת׃
word.greekot: ὅσον ἂν χρόνον ἄκακοι ἔχωνται τῆς δικαιοσύνης οὐκ αἰσχυνθήσονται οἱ δὲ ἄφρονες τῆς ὕβρεως ὄντες ἐπιθυμηταί ἀσεβεῖς γενόμενοι ἐμίσησαν αἴσθησιν

word.kjv: For that they hated knowledge, and did not choose the fear of the LORD:
word.thailand: เพราะว่าเขาเกลียดความรู้ และไม่เลือกเอาความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: Por cuanto aborrecieron la sabiduría, Y no escogieron el temor de Jehová,
word.latinvulgate: eo quod exosam habuerint disciplinam, et timorem Domini non susceperint,
word.italian1927: Poiché hanno odiato la scienza e non hanno scelto il timor dell’Eterno
word.german1912: Darum, daß sie haßten die Lehre und wollten des HERRN Furcht nicht haben,
word.french1910: Parce qu'ils ont haï la science, Et qu'ils n'ont pas choisi la crainte de l'Eternel,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他們恨惡知識，不選擇敬畏耶和華；
word.korean: 그 때에 너희가 나를 부르리라 그래도 내가 대답지 아니하겠고 부지런히 나를 찾으리라 그래도 나를 만나지 못하리니
word.tagalog: Sapagka't kanilang ipinagtanim ang kaalaman, at hindi pinili ang takot sa Panginoon.
word.maori: Mo ratou i kino ki te matauranga; kihai hoki i whiriwhiria e ratou te wehi ki a Ihowa;
word.cebuano: Tungod kay ilang gidumtan ang kinaadman, Ug wala magpili sa pagkahadlok kang Jehova,
word.hebrew: כט  תחת כי-שנאו דעת    ויראת יהוה לא בחרו
word.hebrewmodern: תחת כי שנאו דעת ויראת יהוה לא בחרו׃
word.greekot: ἐμίσησαν γὰρ σοφίαν τὸν δὲ φόβον τοῦ κυρίου οὐ προείλαντο

word.kjv: Yea, if thou criest after knowledge, and liftest up thy voice for understanding;
word.thailand: เออ ถ้าเจ้าร้องหาความรอบรู้ และเปล่งเสียงของเจ้าหาความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Si clamares á la inteligencia, Y á la prudencia dieres tu voz;
word.latinvulgate: Si enim sapientiam invocaveris, et inclinaveris cor tuum prudentiæ ;
word.italian1927: sì, se chiami il discernimento e rivolgi la tua voce all’intelligenza,
word.german1912: ja, so du mit Fleiß darnach rufest und darum betest;
word.french1910: Oui, si tu appelles la sagesse, Et si tu élèves ta voix vers l'intelligence,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你為求哲理而呼喊，為求聰明而揚聲；
word.korean: 지식을 불러 구하며 명철을 얻으려고 소리를 높이며
word.tagalog: Oo, kung ikaw ay dadaing ng pagbubulay, at itataas mo ang iyong tinig sa pagunawa;
word.maori: Ae ra, ki te mea ka karangarangatia e koe te matauranga, a ka puaki tou reo ki te ngakau mohio;
word.cebuano: Oo, kong ikaw magasangpit sa salabutan, Ug magapatugbaw sa imong tingog alang sa pagpakasabut;
word.hebrew: ג  כי אם לבינה תקרא    לתבונה תתן קולך
word.hebrewmodern: כי אם לבינה תקרא לתבונה תתן קולך׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ τὴν σοφίαν ἐπικαλέσῃ καὶ τῇ συνέσει δῷς φωνήν σου τὴν δὲ αἴσθησιν ζητήσῃς μεγάλῃ τῇ φωνῇ

word.kjv: Then shalt thou understand the fear of the LORD, and find the knowledge of God.
word.thailand: นั่นแหละ เจ้าจะเข้าใจความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ และพบความรู้ของพระเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Entonces entenderás el temor de Jehová, Y hallarás el conocimiento de Dios.
word.latinvulgate: tunc intelliges timorem Domini, et scientiam Dei invenies,
word.italian1927: Allora intenderai il timor dell’Eterno, e troverai la conoscenza di Dio.
word.german1912: alsdann wirst du die Furcht des HERRN verstehen und Gottes Erkenntnis finden.
word.french1910: Alors tu comprendras la crainte de l'Eternel, Et tu trouveras la connaissance de Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你就明白怎樣敬畏耶和華，並且獲得對　神的認識。
word.korean: 여호와 경외하기를 깨달으며 하나님을 알게 되리니
word.tagalog: Kung magkagayo'y iyong mauunawa ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon, at masusumpungan mo ang kaalaman ng Dios.
word.maori: Ko reira koe matau ai ki te wehi o Ihowa, kite ai i te mohio ki te Atua.
word.cebuano: Unya ikaw makasabut sa pagkahadlok kang Jehova, Ug hikaplagan mo ang kahibalo sa Dios.
word.hebrew: ה  אז--תבין יראת יהוה    ודעת אלהים תמצא
word.hebrewmodern: אז תבין יראת יהוה ודעת אלהים תמצא׃
word.greekot: τότε συνήσεις φόβον κυρίου καὶ ἐπίγνωσιν θεοῦ εὑρήσεις

word.kjv: For the LORD giveth wisdom: out of his mouth cometh knowledge and understanding.
word.thailand: เพราะพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงประทานปัญญา ความรู้และความเข้าใจมาจากพระโอษฐ์ของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Porque Jehová da la sabiduría, Y de su boca viene el conocimiento y la inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: quia Dominus dat sapientiam, et ex ore ejus prudentia et scientia.
word.italian1927: Poiché l’Eterno dà la sapienza; dalla sua bocca procedono la scienza e l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Denn der HERR gibt Weisheit, und aus seinem Munde kommt Erkenntnis und Verstand.
word.french1910: Car l'Eternel donne la sagesse; De sa bouche sortent la connaissance et l'intelligence;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為耶和華賜人智慧，知識和聰明都出自他的口。
word.korean: 대저 여호와는 지혜를 주시며 지식과 명철을 그 입에서 내심이며
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang Panginoon ay nagbibigay ng karunungan, sa kaniyang bibig nanggagaling ang kaalaman at kaunawaan:
word.maori: Ma Ihowa hoki e homai te whakaaro nui; no tona mangai te matauranga me te ngakau mohio.
word.cebuano: Kay si Jehova mohatag ug kaalam; Gikan sa iyang baba magagula ang kahibalo ug pagpakasabut:
word.hebrew: ו  כי-יהוה יתן חכמה    מפיו דעת ותבונה
word.hebrewmodern: כי יהוה יתן חכמה מפיו דעת ותבונה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι κύριος δίδωσιν σοφίαν καὶ ἀπὸ προσώπου αὐτοῦ γνῶσις καὶ σύνεσις

word.kjv: When wisdom entereth into thine heart, and knowledge is pleasant unto thy soul;
word.thailand: เมื่อปัญญาจะเข้ามาในใจของเจ้า และความรู้จะเป็นที่ร่มรื่นแก่จิตใจของเจ้า
word.spanish1909: Cuando la sabiduría entrare en tu corazón, Y la ciencia fuere dulce á tu alma,
word.latinvulgate: Si intraverit sapientia cor tuum, et scientia animæ tuæ placuerit,
word.italian1927: Perché la sapienza t’entrerà nel cuore, e la scienza sarà gradevole all’anima tua;
word.german1912: Denn Weisheit wird in dein Herz eingehen, daß du gerne lernst;
word.french1910: Car la sagesse viendra dans ton coeur, Et la connaissance fera les délices de ton âme;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧使人行走義路智慧必進入你的心，知識必使你歡悅。
word.korean: 곧 지혜가 네 마음에 들어가며 지식이 네 영혼에 즐겁게 될 것이요
word.tagalog: Sapagka't karunungan ay papasok sa iyong puso, at kaalaman ay magiging ligaya sa iyong kaluluwa;
word.maori: ¶ Ka uru hoki te whakaaro nui ki roto ki tou ngakau, a ka reka te matauranga ki tou wairua;
word.cebuano: Kay ang kaalam mosulod ngadto sa imong kasingkasing, Ug ang kahibalo makapahimuot sa imong kalag;
word.hebrew: י  כי-תבוא חכמה בלבך    ודעת לנפשך ינעם
word.hebrewmodern: כי תבוא חכמה בלבך ודעת לנפשך ינעם׃
word.greekot: ἐὰν γὰρ ἔλθῃ ἡ σοφία εἰς σὴν διάνοιαν ἡ δὲ αἴσθησις τῇ σῇ ψυχῇ καλὴ εἶναι δόξῃ

word.kjv: In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
word.thailand: จงยอมรับรู้พระองค์ในทุกทางของเจ้า และพระองค์จะทรงกระทำให้วิถีของเจ้าราบรื่น
word.spanish1909: Reconócelo en todos tus caminos, Y él enderezará tus veredas.
word.latinvulgate: In omnibus viis tuis cogita illum, et ipse diriget gressus tuos.
word.italian1927: Riconoscilo in tutte le tue vie, ed egli appianerà i tuoi sentieri.
word.german1912: sondern gedenke an ihn in allen deinen Wegen, so wird er dich recht führen.
word.french1910: Reconnais-le dans toutes tes voies, Et il aplanira tes sentiers.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 在你一切所行的路上，都要承認他，他必使你的路徑平坦正直。
word.korean: 너는 범사에 그를 인정하라 ! 그리하면 네 길을 지도하시리라
word.tagalog: Kilalanin mo siya sa lahat ng iyong mga lakad, at kaniyang ituturo ang iyong mga landas.
word.maori: I ou ara katoa whakaaro ki a ia, a mana e whakatika ou huarahi.
word.cebuano: Sa tanan nimong mga dalan ilha siya, Ug siya magamando sa imong mga alagianan.
word.hebrew: ו  בכל-דרכיך דעהו    והוא יישר ארחתיך
word.hebrewmodern: בכל דרכיך דעהו והוא יישר ארחתיך׃
word.greekot: ἐν πάσαις ὁδοῖς σου γνώριζε αὐτήν ἵνα ὀρθοτομῇ τὰς ὁδούς σου ὁ δὲ πούς σου οὐ μὴ προσκόπτῃ

word.kjv: By his knowledge the depths are broken up, and the clouds drop down the dew.
word.thailand: โดยความรู้ของพระองค์น้ำบาดาลก็ปะทุออกมา และเมฆก็หยาดน้ำค้างลงมา
word.spanish1909: Con su ciencia se partieron los abismos, Y destilan el rocío los cielos.
word.latinvulgate: Sapientia illius eruperunt abyssi, et nubes rore concrescunt.
word.italian1927: Per la sua scienza gli abissi furono aperti, e le nubi distillano la rugiada.
word.german1912: Durch seine Weisheit sind die Tiefen zerteilt und die Wolken mit Tau triefend gemacht.
word.french1910: C'est par sa science que les abîmes se sont ouverts, Et que les nuages distillent la rosée.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因他的知識，深淵就裂開，天空也滴下甘露。
word.korean: 그 지식으로 해양이 갈라지게 하셨으며 공중에서 이슬이 내리게 하셨느니라
word.tagalog: Sa kaniyang kaalaman ay nabahagi ang mga kalaliman, at ang mga alapaap ay nagsipatak ng hamog.
word.maori: He mohio nona i pakaru ai nga rire, i maturuturu ai te tomairangi o nga kapua.
word.cebuano: Pinaagi sa iyang kinaadman ang mga kahiladman nangaabli, Ug ang kalangitan nagapatagas sa tun-og.
word.hebrew: כ  בדעתו תהומות נבקעו    ושחקים ירעפו-טל
word.hebrewmodern: בדעתו תהומות נבקעו ושחקים ירעפו טל׃
word.greekot: ἐν αἰσθήσει ἄβυσσοι ἐρράγησαν νέφη δὲ ἐρρύησαν δρόσους

word.kjv: That thou mayest regard discretion, and that thy lips may keep knowledge.
word.thailand: เพื่อเจ้าจะรักษาความเฉลียวฉลาดไว้ และริมฝีปากของเจ้าจะระแวดระวังความรู้
word.spanish1909: Para que guardes consejo, Y tus labios conserven la ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: ut custodias cogitationes, et disciplinam labia tua conservent. Ne attendas fallaciæ mulieris ;
word.italian1927: affinché tu conservi l’accorgimento, e le tue labbra ritengano la scienza.
word.german1912: daß du bewahrest guten Rat und dein Mund wisse Unterschied zu halten.
word.french1910: Afin que tu conserves la réflexion, Et que tes lèvres gardent la connaissance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好讓你持守明辨的態度，你的嘴唇謹守知識。
word.korean: 근신을 지키며 네 입술로 지식을 지키도록 하라
word.tagalog: Upang makapagingat ka ng kabaitan, at upang ang iyong mga labi ay makapagingat ng kaalaman.
word.maori: Kia u ai koe ki te ngarahu pai, kia mau ai te matauranga i ou ngutu.
word.cebuano: Aron ikaw magabantay sa pagkabuotan, Ug aron ang imong mga ngabil magatipig ug kinaadman.
word.hebrew: ב  לשמר מזמות    ודעת שפתיך ינצרו
word.hebrewmodern: לשמר מזמות ודעת שפתיך ינצרו׃
word.greekot: ἵνα φυλάξῃς ἔννοιαν ἀγαθήν αἴσθησιν δὲ ἐμῶν χειλέων ἐντέλλομαί σοι

word.kjv: They are all plain to him that understandeth, and right to them that find knowledge.
word.thailand: คำเหล่านั้นสำหรับผู้ที่เข้าใจก็ตรงหมด สำหรับผู้พบความรู้ก็ถูกต้อง
word.spanish1909: Todas ellas son rectas al que entiende, Y razonables á los que han hallado sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: recti sunt intelligentibus, et æqui invenientibus scientiam.
word.italian1927: Son tutte piane per l’uomo intelligente, e rette per quelli che han trovato la scienza.
word.german1912: Sie sind alle gerade denen, die sie verstehen, und richtig denen, die es annehmen wollen.
word.french1910: Toutes sont claires pour celui qui est intelligent, Et droites pour ceux qui ont trouvé la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我的話對明理的人，都是對的；對得著知識的人，都是正直的。
word.korean: 이는 다 총명 있는 자의 밝히 아는 바요 지식 얻은 자의 정직히 여기는 바니라
word.tagalog: Pawang malilinaw sa kaniya na nakakaunawa, at matuwid sa kanila na nangakakasumpong ng kaalaman.
word.maori: Ko enei katoa he marama ki te tangata e matau ana, he tika ki te hunga i kitea ai te mohio.
word.cebuano: Silang tanan matin-aw alang kaniya nga makasabut, Ug matarung alang kanila nga nakakaplag sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: ט  כלם נכחים למבין    וישרים למצאי דעת
word.hebrewmodern: כלם נכחים למבין וישרים למצאי דעת׃
word.greekot: πάντα ἐνώπια τοῖς συνιοῦσιν καὶ ὀρθὰ τοῖς εὑρίσκουσι γνῶσιν

word.kjv: Receive my instruction, and not silver; and knowledge rather than choice gold.
word.thailand: จงรับคำสั่งสอนของเราแทนเงิน และความรู้แทนทองคำอย่างดี
word.spanish1909: Recibid mi enseñanza, y no plata; Y ciencia antes que el oro escogido.
word.latinvulgate: Accipite disciplinam meam, et non pecuniam ; doctrinam magis quam aurum eligite :
word.italian1927: Ricevete la mia istruzione anziché l’argento, e la scienza anziché l’oro scelto;
word.german1912: Nehmet an meine Zucht lieber denn Silber, und die Lehre achtet höher denn köstliches Gold.
word.french1910: Préférez mes instructions à l'argent, Et la science à l'or le plus précieux;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要接受我的教訓，不要銀子；寧願得著知識，勝過精金；
word.korean: 너희가 은을 받지 말고 나의 훈계를 받으며 정금보다 지식을 얻으라
word.tagalog: Tanggapin mo ang aking turo at huwag pilak; at ang kaalaman na higit kay sa dalisay na ginto.
word.maori: Manakohia mai taku ako, kaua te hiriwa; ko te matauranga, nui atu i te koura pai rawa.
word.cebuano: Dawata ang akong pagpahamatngon, ug ayaw ang salapi; Ug ang kinaadman kay sa piniling bulawan.
word.hebrew: י  קחו-מוסרי ואל-כסף    ודעת מחרוץ נבחר
word.hebrewmodern: קחו מוסרי ואל כסף ודעת מחרוץ נבחר׃
word.greekot: λάβετε παιδείαν καὶ μὴ ἀργύριον καὶ γνῶσιν ὑπὲρ χρυσίον δεδοκιμασμένον ἀνθαιρεῖσθε δὲ αἴσθησιν χρυσίου καθαροῦ

word.kjv: I wisdom dwell with prudence, and find out knowledge of witty inventions.
word.thailand: เราคือปัญญา อยู่ในความหยั่งรู้ และเราพบความรู้แห่งความเฉลียวฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Yo, la sabiduría, habito con la discreción, Y hallo la ciencia de los consejos.
word.latinvulgate: Ego sapientia, habito in consilio, et eruditis intersum cogitationibus.
word.italian1927: Io, la sapienza, sto con l’accorgimento, e trovo la scienza della riflessione.
word.german1912: Ich, Weisheit, wohne bei der Klugheit und weiß guten Rat zu geben.
word.french1910: Moi, la sagesse, j'ai pour demeure le discernement, Et je possède la science de la réflexion.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 尊榮公義出於智慧我──智慧──和精明同住，我又獲得知識和謀略。
word.korean: 나 지혜는 명철로 주소를 삼으며 지식과 근신을 찾아 얻나니
word.tagalog: Akong karunungan ay tumatahan sa kabaitan, at aking nasusumpungan ang kaalaman at gunita.
word.maori: ¶ Kua meinga e ahau, e te whakaaro nui, ko te ngarahu pai hei nohoanga moku, e kitea ana e ahau te mohio me te ata whakaaro.
word.cebuano: Ako nga kaalam naghimo sa kabuotan nga maoy akong puloyanan. Ug nagapangita sa kahibalo ug sa pagpili-sa-maayo.
word.hebrew: יב  אני-חכמה שכנתי ערמה    ודעת מזמות אמצא
word.hebrewmodern: אני חכמה שכנתי ערמה ודעת מזמות אמצא׃
word.greekot: ἐγὼ ἡ σοφία κατεσκήνωσα βουλήν καὶ γνῶσιν καὶ ἔννοιαν ἐγὼ ἐπεκαλεσάμην

word.kjv: The fear of the LORD is the beginning of wisdom: and the knowledge of the holy is understanding.
word.thailand: ความยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์เป็นที่เริ่มต้นของปัญญา และซึ่งรู้จักองค์บริสุทธิ์เป็นความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: El temor de Jehová es el principio de la sabiduría; Y la ciencia de los santos es inteligencia.
word.latinvulgate: Principium sapientiæ timor Domini, et scientia sanctorum prudentia.
word.italian1927: Il principio della sapienza è il timor dell’Eterno, e conoscere il Santo è l’intelligenza.
word.german1912: Der Weisheit Anfang ist des HERRN Furcht, und den Heiligen erkennen ist Verstand.
word.french1910: Le commencement de la sagesse, c'est la crainte de l'Eternel; Et la science des saints, c'est l'intelligence.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏耶和華是智慧的開端，認識至聖者就是聰明。
word.korean: 여호와를 경외하는 것이 지혜의 근본이요 거룩하신 자를 아는 것이 명철이니라
word.tagalog: Ang pagkatakot sa Panginoon ay pasimula ng karunungan: at ang pagkakilala sa Banal ay kaunawaan.
word.maori: Ko te timatanga o te whakaaro nui ko te wehi ki a Ihowa; ko te matauranga, ko te mohio ki te Mea Tapu.
word.cebuano: Ang pagkahadlok kang Jehova maoy sinugdan sa kaalam; Ug ang kahibalo niadtong Balaan mao ang pagsabut.
word.hebrew: י  תחלת חכמה יראת יהוה    ודעת קדשים בינה
word.hebrewmodern: תחלת חכמה יראת יהוה ודעת קדשים בינה׃
word.greekot: τὸ γὰρ γνῶναι νόμον διανοίας ἐστὶν ἀγαθῆς

word.kjv: Wise men lay up knowledge: but the mouth of the foolish is near destruction.
word.thailand: ปราชญ์ก็ส่ำสมความรู้ไว้ แต่ปากของคนโง่นำความพินาศมาใกล้
word.spanish1909: Los sabios guardan la sabiduría: Mas la boca del loco es calamidad cercana.
word.latinvulgate: Sapientes abscondunt scientiam ; os autem stulti confusioni proximum est.
word.italian1927: I savi tengono in serbo la scienza, ma la bocca dello stolto e una rovina imminente.
word.german1912: Die Weisen bewahren die Lehre; aber der Narren Mund ist nahe dem Schrecken.
word.french1910: Les sages tiennent la science en réserve, Mais la bouche de l'insensé est une ruine prochaine.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人積存知識，愚妄人的口招致毀滅。
word.korean: 의인의 수고는 생명에 이르고 악인의 소득은 죄에 이르느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga pantas ay nagiimbak ng kaalaman: nguni't ang bibig ng mangmang ay kasalukuyang ikapapahamak.
word.maori: ¶ Rongoa ai te hunga whakaaro nui i te matauranga: he whakangaromanga ia kei te hori tonu, te mangai o te wairangi.
word.cebuano: Ang mga tawong manggialamon nagatigum ug kahibalo; Apan ang baba sa buang-buang mao ang usa ka pagkalaglag karon.
word.hebrew: יד  חכמים יצפנו-דעת    ופי-אויל מחתה קרבה
word.hebrewmodern: חכמים יצפנו דעת ופי אויל מחתה קרבה׃
word.greekot: σοφοὶ κρύψουσιν αἴσθησιν στόμα δὲ προπετοῦς ἐγγίζει συντριβῇ

word.kjv: An hypocrite with his mouth destroyeth his neighbour: but through knowledge shall the just be delivered.
word.thailand: คนหน้าซื่อใจคดทำลายเพื่อนบ้านของเขาด้วยปาก แต่คนชอบธรรมจะได้รับการช่วยให้พ้นด้วยอาศัยความรู้
word.spanish1909: El hipócrita con la boca daña á su prójimo: Mas los justos son librados con la sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Simulator ore decipit amicum suum ; justi autem liberabuntur scientia.
word.italian1927: Con la sua bocca l’ipocrita rovina il suo prossimo, ma i giusti sono liberati dalla loro perspicacia.
word.german1912: Durch den Mund des Heuchlers wird sein Nächster verderbt; aber die Gerechten merken's und werden erlöst.
word.french1910: Par sa bouche l'impie perd son prochain, Mais les justes sont délivrés par la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不敬虔的人用口敗壞鄰舍，義人卻因知識免受其害。
word.korean: 의인이 형통하면 성읍이 즐거워하고 악인이 패망하면 기뻐 외치느니라
word.tagalog: Pinapatay ng masama ng kaniyang bibig ang kaniyang kapuwa: nguni't sa kaalaman ay maliligtas ang matuwid.
word.maori: ¶ Hei huna mo tona hoa te mangai o te tangata whakaponokore; na ma te mohio te hunga tika ka mawhiti ai.
word.cebuano: Pinaagi sa iyang baba ang tawo nga dili-diosnon magalaglag sa iyang isigkatawo; Apan pinaagi sa kahibalo ang tawong matarung mamaluwas.
word.hebrew: ט  בפה--חנף ישחת רעהו    ובדעת צדיקים יחלצו
word.hebrewmodern: בפה חנף ישחת רעהו ובדעת צדיקים יחלצו׃
word.greekot: ἐν ἀγαθοῖς δικαίων κατώρθωσεν πόλις

word.kjv: Whoso loveth instruction loveth knowledge: but he that hateth reproof is brutish.
word.thailand: ผู้ใดที่รักคำสั่งสอนก็รักความรู้ แต่บุคคลที่เกลียดการตักเตือนก็เป็นคนโฉด
word.spanish1909: EL que ama la corrección ama la sabiduría: Mas el que aborrece la reprensión, es ignorante.
word.latinvulgate: Qui diligit disciplinam diligit scientiam ; qui autem odit increpationes insipiens est.
word.italian1927: Chi ama la correzione ama la scienza, ma chi odia la riprensione è uno stupido.
word.german1912: Wer sich gern läßt strafen, der wird klug werden; wer aber ungestraft sein will, der bleibt ein Narr.
word.french1910: Celui qui aime la correction aime la science; Celui qui hait la réprimande est stupide.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的話能醫治人喜愛教訓的，就是喜愛知識；厭惡責備的，卻是愚頑人。
word.korean: 훈계를 좋아하는 자는 지식을 좋아하나니 징계를 싫어하는 자는 짐승과 같으니라
word.tagalog: Sinomang umiibig ng kasawayan ay umiibig ng kaalaman: nguni't siyang nagtatanim sa kasawayan ay hangal.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e aroha ana ki te kupu ako e aroha ana ki te matauranga; na, ko te tangata e kore e pai kia riria tona he, he poauau tera.
word.cebuano: Bisan kinsa nga mahagugma sa pagsaway mahagugma sa kahibalo; Apan kadtong magadumot sa pagbadlong mananapon man.
word.hebrew: א  אהב מוסר אהב דעת    ושונא תוכחת בער
word.hebrewmodern: אהב מוסר אהב דעת ושנא תוכחת בער׃
word.greekot: ὁ ἀγαπῶν παιδείαν ἀγαπᾷ αἴσθησιν ὁ δὲ μισῶν ἐλέγχους ἄφρων

word.kjv: A prudent man concealeth knowledge: but the heart of fools proclaimeth foolishness.
word.thailand: คนที่หยั่งรู้ย่อมเก็บความรู้ไว้ แต่ใจคนโง่ป่าวร้องความโง่เขลา
word.spanish1909: El hombre cuerdo encubre la ciencia: Mas el corazón de los necios publica la necedad.
word.latinvulgate: Homo versatus celat scientiam, et cor insipientium provocat stultitiam.
word.italian1927: L’uomo accorto nasconde quello che sa, ma il cuor degli stolti proclama la loro follia.
word.german1912: Ein verständiger Mann trägt nicht Klugheit zur Schau; aber das Herz der Narren ruft seine Narrheit aus.
word.french1910: L'homme prudent cache sa science, Mais le coeur des insensés proclame la folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 精明的人隱藏自己的知識，愚昧人的心卻顯出愚妄。
word.korean: 슬기로운 자는 지식을 감추어 두어도 미련한 자의 마음은 미련한 것을 전파하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang taong mabait ay nagkukubli ng kaalaman: nguni't ang puso ng mga mangmang ay nagtatanyag ng kamangmangan.
word.maori: ¶ Hipoki ai te tangata tupato i te matauranga: e karanga nui ana ia te ngakau o nga kuware i te kuwaretanga.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawong buotan nagabaton ug kahibalo; Apan ang kasingkasing sa mga buang nagabutyag sa kabuangan.
word.hebrew: כג  אדם ערום כסה דעת    ולב כסילים יקרא אולת
word.hebrewmodern: אדם ערום כסה דעת ולב כסילים יקרא אולת׃
word.greekot: ἀνὴρ συνετὸς θρόνος αἰσθήσεως καρδία δὲ ἀφρόνων συναντήσεται ἀραῖς

word.kjv: Every prudent man dealeth with knowledge: but a fool layeth open his folly.
word.thailand: บรรดาคนที่หยั่งรู้กระทำทุกอย่างด้วยความรู้ แต่คนโง่ก็อวดความโง่ของตน
word.spanish1909: Todo hombre cuerdo obra con sabiduría: Mas el necio manifestará necedad.
word.latinvulgate: Astutus omnia agit cum consilio, qui autem fatuus est aperit stultitiam.
word.italian1927: Ogni uomo accorto agisce con conoscenza, ma l’insensato fa sfoggio di follia.
word.german1912: Ein Kluger tut alles mit Vernunft; ein Narr aber breitet Narrheit aus.
word.french1910: Tout homme prudent agit avec connaissance, Mais l'insensé fait étalage de folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 精明的人都按知識行事，愚昧人卻顯露自己的愚妄。
word.korean: 악한 사자는 재앙에 빠져도 충성된 사신은 양약이 되느니라
word.tagalog: Bawa't mabait na tao ay gumagawang may kaalaman: nguni't ang mangmang ay nagkakalat ng kamangmangan.
word.maori: ¶ He mahi mohio ta te tangata tupato; ko ta te wairangi he hora i te kuwaretanga.
word.cebuano: Ang tagsatagsa ka buotan nga tawo magabuhat uban sa kahibalo; Apan ang buang magapagarbo sa iyang binuang.
word.hebrew: טז  כל-ערום יעשה בדעת    וכסיל יפרש אולת
word.hebrewmodern: כל ערום יעשה בדעת וכסיל יפרש אולת׃
word.greekot: πᾶς πανοῦργος πράσσει μετὰ γνώσεως ὁ δὲ ἄφρων ἐξεπέτασεν ἑαυτοῦ κακίαν

word.kjv: A scorner seeketh wisdom, and findeth it not: but knowledge is easy unto him that understandeth.
word.thailand: คนมักเยาะเย้ยแสวงปัญญาเสียเปล่า แต่ความรู้นั้นก็ง่ายแก่คนที่มีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Busca el escarnecedor la sabiduría, y no la halla: Mas la sabiduría al hombre entendido es fácil.
word.latinvulgate: Quærit derisor sapientiam, et non invenit ; doctrina prudentium facilis.
word.italian1927: Il beffardo cerca la sapienza e non la trova, ma per l’uomo intelligente la scienza è cosa facile.
word.german1912: Der Spötter sucht Weisheit, und findet sie nicht; aber dem Verständigen ist die Erkenntnis leicht.
word.french1910: Le moqueur cherche la sagesse et ne la trouve pas, Mais pour l'homme intelligent la science est chose facile.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好譏笑人的尋找智慧，卻尋不著；聰明人尋找知識，卻輕易得著。
word.korean: 거만한 자는 지혜를 구하여도 얻지 못하거니와 명철한 자는 지식 얻기가 쉬우니라
word.tagalog: Ang manglilibak ay humahanap ng karunungan at walang nasusumpungan: nguni't ang kaalaman ay madali sa kaniya na naguunawa.
word.maori: ¶ E rapu ana te tangata whakahi i te whakaaro nui, heoi kahore e kitea e ia; ki te tangata matau ia he mama noa te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka mayubiton magapangita sa kaalam ug dilimakakaplag niini; Apan ang kahibalo masayon alang kaniya nga may salabutan.
word.hebrew: ו  בקש-לץ חכמה ואין    ודעת לנבון נקל
word.hebrewmodern: בקש לץ חכמה ואין ודעת לנבון נקל׃
word.greekot: ζητήσεις σοφίαν παρὰ κακοῖς καὶ οὐχ εὑρήσεις αἴσθησις δὲ παρὰ φρονίμοις εὐχερής

word.kjv: Go from the presence of a foolish man, when thou perceivest not in him the lips of knowledge.
word.thailand: จงไปให้พ้นหน้าคนโง่ เมื่อเจ้าไม่พบริมฝีปากแห่งความรู้ในตัวเขา
word.spanish1909: Vete de delante del hombre necio, Porque en él no advertirás labios de ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Vade contra virum stultum, et nescit labia prudentiæ.
word.italian1927: Vattene lungi dallo stolto; sulle sue labbra certo non hai trovato scienza.
word.german1912: Gehe von dem Narren; denn du lernst nichts von ihm.
word.french1910: Eloigne-toi de l'insensé; Ce n'est pas sur ses lèvres que tu aperçois la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你當離開愚昧人，因為你不會從他的嘴裡曉得知識。
word.korean: 너는 미련한 자의 앞을 떠나라 그 입술에 지식 있음을 보지 못함이니라
word.tagalog: Paroon ka sa harapan ng taong mangmang, at hindi mo mamamalas sa kaniya ang mga labi ng kaalaman:
word.maori: ¶ Haere atu ki te aroaro o te kuware, ina kahore e kitea e koe he ngutu matau ona.
word.cebuano: Lakaw ngadto sa atubangan sa usa ka tawong buangbuang, Ug ikaw dili makakaplag diha kaniya sa mga ngabil sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: ז  לך מנגד לאיש כסיל    ובל-ידעת שפתי-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: לך מנגד לאיש כסיל ובל ידעת שפתי דעת׃
word.greekot: πάντα ἐναντία ἀνδρὶ ἄφρονι ὅπλα δὲ αἰσθήσεως χείλη σοφά

word.kjv: The simple inherit folly: but the prudent are crowned with knowledge.
word.thailand: คนเขลาได้ความโง่เป็นมรดก แต่คนหยั่งรู้ก็มีความรู้เป็นมงกุฎ
word.spanish1909: Los simples heredarán necedad: Mas los cuerdos se coronarán de sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Possidebunt parvuli stultitiam, et exspectabunt astuti scientiam.
word.italian1927: Gli scemi ereditano stoltezza, ma i prudenti s’incoronano di scienza.
word.german1912: Die Unverständigen erben Narrheit; aber es ist der Klugen Krone, vorsichtig handeln.
word.french1910: Les simples ont en partage la folie, Et les hommes prudents se font de la science une couronne.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚蒙人得愚妄為產業；精明的人以知識為冠冕。
word.korean: 어리석은 자는 어리석음으로 기업을 삼아도 슬기로운 자는 지식으로 면류관을 삼느니라
word.tagalog: Ang musmos ay nagmamana ng kamangmangan: nguni't ang mabait ay puputungan ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ He wairangi te whakarerenga iho mo nga kuware; ko te tangata tupato ia ka karaunatia ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ang walay-pagtagad makapanunod sa binuang; Apan ang mga buotan pagapurongpurongan sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יח  נחלו פתאים אולת    וערומים יכתרו דעת
word.hebrewmodern: נחלו פתאים אולת וערומים יכתרו דעת׃
word.greekot: μεριοῦνται ἄφρονες κακίαν οἱ δὲ πανοῦργοι κρατήσουσιν αἰσθήσεως

word.kjv: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
word.thailand: ลิ้นของปราชญ์ใช้ความรู้อย่างถูกต้อง แต่ปากของคนโง่เทความโง่ออกมา
word.spanish1909: La lengua de los sabios adornará la sabiduría: Mas la boca de los necios hablará sandeces.
word.latinvulgate: Lingua sapientium ornat scientiam ; os fatuorum ebullit stultitiam.
word.italian1927: La lingua dei savi è ricca di scienza, ma la bocca degli stolti sgorga follia.
word.german1912: Der Weisen Zunge macht die Lehre lieblich; der Narren Mund speit eitel Narrheit.
word.french1910: La langue des sages rend la science aimable, Et la bouche des insensés répand la folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的舌頭闡揚知識；愚昧人的口發出愚妄。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자의 혀는 지식을 선히 베풀고 미련한 자의 입은 미련한 것을 쏟느니라
word.tagalog: Ang dila ng pantas ay nagbabadya ng tuos ng kaalaman: nguni't ang bibig ng mga mangmang ay nagbubugso ng kamangmangan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te arero o te tangata whakaaro nui e whakahua tika ana i te matauranga: e whakapuaki ana ia te mangai o nga kuware i te wairangi.
word.cebuano: Ang dila sa manggialamon sa matul-id nagapamulong ug kahibalo; Apan ang baba sa mga buang nagabubo sa kabuangan.
word.hebrew: ב  לשון חכמים תיטיב דעת    ופי כסילים יביע אולת
word.hebrewmodern: לשון חכמים תיטיב דעת ופי כסילים יביע אולת׃
word.greekot: γλῶσσα σοφῶν καλὰ ἐπίσταται στόμα δὲ ἀφρόνων ἀναγγελεῖ κακά

word.kjv: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
word.thailand: ริมฝีปากของปราชญ์กระจายความรู้ แต่ความคิดของคนโง่หาเป็นเช่นนั้นไม่
word.spanish1909: Los labios de los sabios esparcen sabiduría: Mas no así el corazón de los necios.
word.latinvulgate: Labia sapientium disseminabunt scientiam ; cor stultorum dissimile erit.
word.italian1927: Le labbra dei savi spargono scienza, ma non così il cuore degli stolti.
word.german1912: Der Weisen Mund streut guten Rat; aber der Narren Herz ist nicht richtig.
word.french1910: Les lèvres des sages répandent la science, Mais le coeur des insensés n'est pas droit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的嘴唇散播知識；愚昧人的心並不是這樣。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자의 입술은 지식을 전파하여도 미련한 자의 마음은 정함이 없느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga labi ng pantas ay nagsasabog ng kaalaman: nguni't ang puso ng mangmang ay hindi gayon.
word.maori: ¶ E ruia ana te matauranga e nga ngutu o nga whakaaro nui: kahore ia he pena a te ngakau o nga kuware.
word.cebuano: Ang mga ngabil sa manggialamon nagabutyag ug kahibalo; Apan ang kasingkasing sa buangbuang dili magabuhat sa ingon.
word.hebrew: ז  שפתי חכמים יזרו דעת    ולב כסילים לא-כן
word.hebrewmodern: שפתי חכמים יזרו דעת ולב כסילים לא כן׃
word.greekot: χείλη σοφῶν δέδεται αἰσθήσει καρδίαι δὲ ἀφρόνων οὐκ ἀσφαλεῖς

word.kjv: The heart of him that hath understanding seeketh knowledge: but the mouth of fools feedeth on foolishness.
word.thailand: ใจของบุคคลผู้มีความเข้าใจก็แสวงความรู้ แต่ปากของคนโง่กินความโง่เป็นอาหาร
word.spanish1909: El corazón entendido busca la sabiduría: Mas la boca de los necios pace necedad.
word.latinvulgate: Cor sapientis quærit doctrinam, et os stultorum pascitur imperitia.
word.italian1927: Il cuor dell’uomo intelligente cerca la scienza, ma la bocca degli stolti si pasce di follia.
word.german1912: Ein kluges Herz handelt bedächtig; aber der Narren Mund geht mit Torheit um.
word.french1910: Un coeur intelligent cherche la science, Mais la bouche des insensés se plaît à la folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聰明人的心尋求知識，愚昧人的口只吃愚妄。
word.korean: 명철한 자의 마음은 지식을 요구하고 미련한 자의 입은 미련한 것을 즐기느니라
word.tagalog: Ang puso niyaong naguunawa ay humahanap ng kaalaman: nguni't ang bibig ng mga mangmang ay kumakain ng kamangmangan.
word.maori: ¶ E rapu ana te ngakau mohio i te matauranga; ko te kuware ia ta te mangai o nga wairangi e kai ai.
word.cebuano: Ang kasingkasing niadtong may salabutan nagapangita ug kahibalo; Apan ang baba sa mga buang nagakaon sa mga binuang.
word.hebrew: יד  לב נבון יבקש-דעת    ופני (ופי) כסילים ירעה אולת
word.hebrewmodern: לב נבון יבקש דעת ופני כסילים ירעה אולת׃
word.greekot: καρδία ὀρθὴ ζητεῖ αἴσθησιν στόμα δὲ ἀπαιδεύτων γνώσεται κακά

word.kjv: He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่ยับยั้งถ้อยคำของเขาเป็นคนมีความรู้ และบุคคลผู้มีจิตใจเยือกเย็นเป็นคนมีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Detiene sus dichos el que tiene sabiduría: De prudente espíritu es el hombre entendido.
word.latinvulgate: Qui moderatur sermones suos doctus et prudens est, et pretiosi spiritus vir eruditus.
word.italian1927: Chi modera le sue parole possiede la scienza, e chi ha lo spirito calmo è un uomo prudente.
word.german1912: Ein Vernünftiger mäßigt seine Rede; und ein verständiger Mann ist kaltes Muts.
word.french1910: Celui qui retient ses paroles connaît la science, Et celui qui a l'esprit calme est un homme intelligent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有知識的約束自己的言語；聰明人心平氣和。
word.korean: 말을 아끼는 자는 지식이 있고 성품이 안존한 자는 명철하니라
word.tagalog: Siyang nagtitipid ng kaniyang mga salita ay may kaalaman: at siyang may diwang malamig ay taong naguunawa.
word.maori: ¶ He matauranga to te tangata e tohu ana i ana kupu: a he whakaaro to te tangata i te wairua manawanui.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagapugong sa iyang mga pulong may kahibalo; Ug kadtong may usa ka mabugnawng espiritu maoy usa ka tawo sa salabutan.
word.hebrew: כז  חושך אמריו יודע דעת    וקר- (יקר-) רוח איש תבונה
word.hebrewmodern: חושך אמריו יודע דעת וקר רוח איש תבונה׃
word.greekot: ὃς φείδεται ῥῆμα προέσθαι σκληρόν ἐπιγνώμων μακρόθυμος δὲ ἀνὴρ φρόνιμος

word.kjv: The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.
word.thailand: ใจของคนหยั่งรู้ย่อมหาความรู้ และหูของปราชญ์แสวงความรู้
word.spanish1909: El corazón del entendido adquiere sabiduría; Y el oído de los sabios busca la ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Cor prudens possidebit scientiam, et auris sapientium quærit doctrinam.
word.italian1927: Il cuore dell’uomo intelligente acquista la scienza, e l’orecchio dei savi la cerca.
word.german1912: Ein verständiges Herz weiß sich vernünftig zu halten; und die Weisen hören gern, wie man vernünftig handelt.
word.french1910: Un coeur intelligent acquiert la science, Et l'oreille des sages cherche la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聰明人的心獲得知識；智慧人的耳朵尋求知識。
word.korean: 명철한 자의 마음은 지식을 얻고 지혜로운 자의 귀는 지식을 구하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang puso ng mabait ay nagtatamo ng kaalaman; at ang pakinig ng pantas ay humahanap ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whiwhi te ngakau o te tangata matau ki te mohio; e rapu ana hoki te taringa o nga whakaaro nui ki te mohio.
word.cebuano: Ang kasingkasing sa buotan magabaton sa kahibalo; Ug ang igdulungog sa manggialamon magapangita sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: טו  לב נבון יקנה-דעת    ואזן חכמים תבקש-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: לב נבון יקנה דעת ואזן חכמים תבקש דעת׃
word.greekot: καρδία φρονίμου κτᾶται αἴσθησιν ὦτα δὲ σοφῶν ζητεῖ ἔννοιαν

word.kjv: Also, that the soul be without knowledge, it is not good; and he that hasteth with his feet sinneth.
word.thailand: แล้วการที่จิตใจคนไม่มีความรู้ก็ไม่ดี และบุคคลที่เร่งเท้าหนักก็มักพลาดผิด
word.spanish1909: El alma sin ciencia no es buena; Y el presuroso de pies peca.
word.latinvulgate: Ubi non est scientia animæ, non est bonum, et qui festinus est pedibus offendet.
word.italian1927: L’ardore stesso, senza conoscenza, non è cosa buona: e chi cammina in fretta sbaglia strada.
word.german1912: Wo man nicht mit Vernunft handelt, da geht's nicht wohl zu; und wer schnell ist mit Füßen, der tut sich Schaden.
word.french1910: Le manque de science n'est bon pour personne, Et celui qui précipite ses pas tombe dans le péché.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 一個人沒有知識是不好的，腳步匆忙的，難免失足。
word.korean: 지식 없는 소원은 선치 못하고 발이 급한 사람은 그릇하느니라
word.tagalog: Gayon din ang kaluluwa na walang kaalaman ay hindi mabuti; at siyang nagmamadali ng kaniyang mga paa ay nagkakasala.
word.maori: ¶ Na ehara hoki i te mea pai kia kaua he matauranga mo te wairua; a, ko te tangata e hohoro ana ona waewae, ka hara.
word.cebuano: Ang kalag usab nga walay kahibalo dili maayo; Ug kadtong magadali sa iyang mga tiil magapakasala.
word.hebrew: ב  גם בלא-דעת נפש לא-טוב    ואץ ברגלים חוטא
word.hebrewmodern: גם בלא דעת נפש לא טוב ואץ ברגלים חוטא׃
word.greekot: πλοῦτος προστίθησιν φίλους πολλούς ὁ δὲ πτωχὸς καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ ὑπάρχοντος φίλου λείπεται

word.kjv: Smite a scorner, and the simple will beware: and reprove one that hath understanding, and he will understand knowledge.
word.thailand: จงตีคนที่มักเยาะเย้ย และคนเขลาจะเรียนความหยั่งรู้เอง จงตักเตือนคนที่มีความเข้าใจและเขาจะเข้าใจความรู้
word.spanish1909: Hiere al escarnecedor, y el simple se hará avisado; Y corrigiendo al entendido, entenderá ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Pestilente flagellato stultus sapientior erit ; si autem corripueris sapientem, intelliget disciplinam.
word.italian1927: Percuoti il beffardo, e il semplice si farà accorto; riprendi l’intelligente, e imparerà la scienza.
word.german1912: Schlägt man den Spötter, so wird der Unverständige klug; straft man einen Verständigen, so wird er vernünftig.
word.french1910: Frappe le moqueur, et le sot deviendra sage; Reprends l'homme intelligent, et il comprendra la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 責打好譏笑人的，愚蒙人就會變得精明；責備聰明人，他就會明白知識。
word.korean: 거만한 자를 때리라 그리하면 어리석은 자도 경성하리라 명철한 자를 견책하라 그리하면 그가 지식을 얻으리라
word.tagalog: Iyong saktan ang manglilibak, at ang musmos ay magaaral ng kabaitan: at iyong sawayin ang naguunawa, at siya'y makakaunawa ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Pakia te tangata whakahi, a ka tupato nga kuware: akona hoki te tangata mahara, a ka mohio ia ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Bunali ang usa ka mayubiton, ug ang walay-pagtagad makakat-on ug pagkabuotan; Ug badlonga ang usa nga may salabutan, ug siya makasabut sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: כה  לץ תכה ופתי יערם    והוכיח לנבון יבין דעת
word.hebrewmodern: לץ תכה ופתי יערם והוכיח לנבון יבין דעת׃
word.greekot: υἱὸς ἀπολειπόμενος φυλάξαι παιδείαν πατρὸς μελετήσει ῥήσεις κακάς

word.kjv: Cease, my son, to hear the instruction that causeth to err from the words of knowledge.
word.thailand: บุตรชายของเราเอ๋ย จงเลิกฟังคำสั่งสอนที่ทำให้เจ้าหลงไปจากคำแห่งความรู้
word.spanish1909: Cesa, hijo mío, de oir la enseñanza Que induce á divagar de las razones de sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Non cesses, fili, audire doctrinam, nec ignores sermones scientiæ.
word.italian1927: Cessa, figliuol mio, d’ascoltar l’istruzione, se ti vuoi allontanare dalle parole della scienza.
word.german1912: Laß ab, mein Sohn, zu hören die Zucht, und doch abzuirren von vernünftiger Lehre.
word.french1910: Cesse, mon fils, d'écouter l'instruction, Si c'est pour t'éloigner des paroles de la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我兒，你若是停止聽受管教，就會偏離知識的言語。
word.korean: 내 아들아 지식의 말씀에서 떠나게 하는 교훈을 듣지 말지니라
word.tagalog: Magtigil ka, anak ko, sa pakikinig ng aral na nagliligaw lamang mula sa mga salita ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Kati, e taku tama, te whakarongo ki te ako hei mea kau e kotiti atu ai i nga kupu o te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Hunong, anak ko sa pagpamati sa pahamatngon, Nga magatudlo lamang ngadto sa kasaypanan sa mga pulong sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: כז  חדל-בני לשמע מוסר    לשגות מאמרי-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: חדל בני לשמע מוסר לשגות מאמרי דעת׃
word.greekot: ἑτοιμάζονται ἀκολάστοις μάστιγες καὶ τιμωρίαι ὤμοις ἀφρόνων

word.kjv: There is gold, and a multitude of rubies: but the lips of knowledge are a precious jewel.
word.thailand: มีทองคำและทับทิมมีค่าเป็นอันมาก แต่ริมฝีปากที่มีความรู้ก็เป็นเพชรนิลจินดาประเสริฐ
word.spanish1909: Hay oro y multitud de piedras preciosas: Mas los labios sabios son vaso precioso.
word.latinvulgate: Est aurum et multitudo gemmarum, et vas pretiosum labia scientiæ.
word.italian1927: C’è dell’oro e abbondanza di perle, ma le labbra ricche di scienza son cosa più preziosa.
word.german1912: Es gibt Gold und viele Perlen; aber ein vernünftiger Mund ist ein edles Kleinod.
word.french1910: Il y a de l'or et beaucoup de perles; Mais les lèvres savantes sont un objet précieux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 雖有金子、許多紅寶石和寶器，但充滿知識的嘴唇比這一切更寶貴。
word.korean: 세상에 금도 있고 진주도 많거니와 지혜로운 입술이 더욱 귀한 보배니라
word.tagalog: May ginto, at saganang mga rubi: nguni't ang mga labi ng kaalaman ay mahalagang hiyas.
word.maori: ¶ He koura tena me te tini o te rupi; engari he taonga utu nui nga ngutu o te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Adunay bulawan, ug daghang mga rubi; Apan ang mga ngabil sa kahibalo maoy usa ka bililhong mutya.
word.hebrew: טו  יש זהב ורב-פנינים    וכלי יקר שפתי-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: יש זהב ורב פנינים וכלי יקר שפתי דעת׃
word.greekot: παρὰ κυρίου εὐθύνεται τὰ διαβήματα ἀνδρί θνητὸς δὲ πῶς ἂν νοήσαι τὰς ὁδοὺς αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.
word.thailand: เมื่อคนมักเยาะเย้ยถูกลงโทษ คนเขลาก็ฉลาดขึ้น เมื่อปราชญ์ได้รับการสั่งสอน เขาก็ได้ความรู้
word.spanish1909: Cuando el escarnecedor es castigado, el simple se hace sabio; Y cuando se amonestare al sabio, aprenderá ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Mulctato pestilente, sapientior erit parvulus, et si sectetur sapientem, sumet scientiam.
word.italian1927: Quando il beffardo è punito, il semplice diventa savio; e quando s’istruisce il savio, egli acquista scienza.
word.german1912: Wenn der Spötter gestraft wird, so werden die Unvernünftigen Weise; und wenn man einen Weisen unterrichtet, so wird er vernünftig.
word.french1910: Quand on châtie le moqueur, le sot devient sage; Et quand on instruit le sage, il accueille la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好譏笑人的受刑罰的時候，愚蒙人就得著智慧；智慧人受訓誨的時候，他就得著知識。
word.korean: 거만한 자가 벌을 받으면 어리석은 자는 경성하겠고 지혜로운 자가 교훈을 받으면 지식이 더 하리라
word.tagalog: Pagka ang mangduduwahagi ay pinarusahan, ang musmos ay nagiging pantas: at pagka ang pantas ay tinuturuan, siya'y tumatanggap ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te whiua te tangata whakahi, ka whai whakaaro te kuware: a, ki te whakaakona te tangata whakaaro nui, ka whiwhi ia ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Kong ang mayubiton pagasilotan, ang walay-pagtagad mahimong manggialamon; Ug kong ang manggialamon pahamatngonon siya makadawat ug kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יא  בענש-לץ יחכם-פתי    ובהשכיל לחכם יקח-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: בענש לץ יחכם פתי ובהשכיל לחכם יקח דעת׃
word.greekot: συνίει δίκαιος καρδίας ἀσεβῶν καὶ φαυλίζει ἀσεβεῖς ἐν κακοῖς

word.kjv: The eyes of the LORD preserve knowledge, and he overthroweth the words of the transgressor.
word.thailand: พระเนตรพระเยโฮวาห์เฝ้าอยู่เหนือความรู้ แต่พระองค์ทรงคว่ำถ้อยคำของคนละเมิด
word.spanish1909: Los ojos de Jehová miran por la ciencia; Mas él trastorna las cosas de los prevaricadores.
word.latinvulgate: Oculi Domini custodiunt scientiam, et supplantantur verba iniqui.
word.italian1927: Gli occhi dell’Eterno proteggono la scienza, ma egli rende vane le parole del perfido.
word.german1912: Die Augen des HERRN behüten guten Rat; aber die Worte des Verächters verkehrt er.
word.french1910: Les yeux de l'Eternel gardent la science, Mais il confond les paroles du perfide.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的眼目護衛知識，卻傾覆奸詐人的話。
word.korean: 여호와께서는 지식있는 자를 그 눈으로 지키시나 궤사한 자의 말은 패하게 하시느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga mata ng Panginoon ay nagiingat sa maalam: nguni't kaniyang ibinabagsak ang mga salita ng taksil.
word.maori: ¶ Ma nga kanohi o Ihowa e tiaki te tangata whai matauranga, e whakataka ana hoki e ia nga kupu a te tangata kopeka.
word.cebuano: Ang mga mata ni Jehova magapanalipod kaniya nga may kahibalo; Apan siya magawagtang sa mga pulong sa tawong mabudhion
word.hebrew: יב  עיני יהוה נצרו דעת    ויסלף דברי בגד
word.hebrewmodern: עיני יהוה נצרו דעת ויסלף דברי בגד׃
word.greekot: προφασίζεται καὶ λέγει ὀκνηρός λέων ἐν ταῖς ὁδοῖς ἐν δὲ ταῖς πλατείαις φονευταί

word.kjv: Bow down thine ear, and hear the words of the wise, and apply thine heart unto my knowledge.
word.thailand: เอียงหูของเจ้าและฟังถ้อยคำของปราชญ์ และเอาใจใส่ความรู้ของเรา
word.spanish1909: Inclina tu oído, y oye las palabras de los sabios, Y pon tu corazón á mi sabiduría:
word.latinvulgate: Inclina aurem tuam, et audi verba sapientium, appone autem cor ad doctrinam meam :
word.italian1927: Porgi l’orecchio e ascolta le parole dei Savi ed applica il cuore alla mia scienza.
word.german1912: Neige deine Ohren und höre die Worte der Weisen und nimm zu Herzen meine Lehre.
word.french1910: Prête l'oreille, et écoute les paroles des sages; Applique ton coeur à ma science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 待人處事需仁慈謹慎你要留心聽智慧人的言語，專心領受我的知識。
word.korean: 너는 귀를 기울여 지혜있는 자의 말씀을 들으며 내 지식에 마음을 둘지어다
word.tagalog: Ikiling mo ang iyong pakinig, at iyong dinggin ang mga salita ng pantas, at ihilig mo ang iyong puso sa aking kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Anga mai tou taringa, whakarongo mai hoki ki nga kupu a te hunga whakaaro nui, kia tahuri mai hoki tou ngakau ki toku matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ikiling ang imong igdulungog, ug pamatia ang mga pulong sa manggialamon, Ug ibutang ang imong kasingkasing sa akong kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יז  הט אזנך--ושמע דברי חכמים    ולבך תשית לדעתי
word.hebrewmodern: הט אזנך ושמע דברי חכמים ולבך תשית לדעתי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐὰν ἐμβάλῃς αὐτοὺς εἰς τὴν καρδίαν σου εὐφρανοῦσίν σε ἅμα ἐπὶ σοῖς χείλεσιν

word.kjv: Have not I written to thee excellent things in counsels and knowledge,
word.thailand: เราได้เขียนให้เจ้าถึงสิ่งวิเศษนัก ถึงเรื่องการปรึกษาและความรู้แล้วมิใช่หรือ
word.spanish1909: ¿No te he escrito tres veces En consejos y ciencia,
word.latinvulgate: Ecce descripsi eam tibi tripliciter, in cogitationibus et scientia ;
word.italian1927: Non ho io già da tempo scritto per te consigli e insegnamenti
word.german1912: Habe ich dir's nicht mannigfaltig vorgeschrieben mit Rat und Lehren,
word.french1910: N'ai-je pas déjà pour toi mis par écrit Des conseils et des réflexions,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我不是曾經給你們寫下（“我不是曾經給你們寫下”或譯：“我不是給你們寫了三十條”）有關謀略和知識的事嗎？
word.korean: 내가 모략과 지식의 아름다운 것을 기록하여
word.tagalog: Hindi ba ako sumulat sa iyo ng mga marilag na bagay na mga payo at kaalaman;
word.maori: He teka ianei hira rawa nga mea kua tuhituhia atu nei e ahau ki a koe, he kupu ako, he kupu mohio;
word.cebuano: Wala ba ako makasulat kanimo ug mga maayo uyamut nga mga butang Sa mga tambag ug kahibalo,
word.hebrew: כ  הלא כתבתי לך שלשום (שלשים)--    במעצות ודעת
word.hebrewmodern: הלא כתבתי לך שלשום במועצות ודעת׃
word.greekot: διδάσκω οὖν σε ἀληθῆ λόγον καὶ γνῶσιν ἀγαθὴν ὑπακούειν τοῦ ἀποκρίνεσθαι λόγους ἀληθείας τοῖς προβαλλομένοις σοι

word.kjv: Apply thine heart unto instruction, and thine ears to the words of knowledge.
word.thailand: จงเอาใจของเจ้ารับคำสั่งสอน และเอาหูของเจ้ารับถ้อยคำแห่งความรู้
word.spanish1909: Aplica tu corazón á la enseñanza, Y tus oídos á las palabras de sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Ingrediatur ad doctrinam cor tuum, et aures tuæ ad verba scientiæ.
word.italian1927: Applica il tuo cuore all’istruzione, e gli orecchi alle parole della scienza.
word.german1912: Gib dein Herz zur Zucht und deine Ohren zu vernünftiger Rede.
word.french1910: Ouvre ton coeur à l'instruction, Et tes oreilles aux paroles de la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要專心領受教訓，留心聽知識的言語。
word.korean: 훈계에 착심하며 지식의 말씀에 귀를 기울이라
word.tagalog: Ihilig mo ang iyong puso sa turo, at ang iyong mga pakinig sa mga salita ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Anga atu tou ngakau ki te ako, me ou taringa ki nga kupu o te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ibutang ang imong kasingkasing sa pahamatngon, Ug ang imong mga igdulungog sa mga pulong sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יב  הביאה למוסר לבך    ואזנך לאמרי-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: הביאה למוסר לבך ואזנך לאמרי דעת׃
word.greekot: δὸς εἰς παιδείαν τὴν καρδίαν σου τὰ δὲ ὦτά σου ἑτοίμασον λόγοις αἰσθήσεως

word.kjv: And by knowledge shall the chambers be filled with all precious and pleasant riches.
word.thailand: โดยความรู้บรรดาห้องก็เต็มไปด้วยความมั่งคั่งล้วนประเสริฐและเพลิดเพลินทั้งสิ้น
word.spanish1909: Y con ciencia se henchirán las cámaras De todo bien preciado y agradable.
word.latinvulgate: In doctrina replebuntur cellaria, universa substantia pretiosa et pulcherrima.
word.italian1927: mediante la scienza, se ne riempiono le stanze d’ogni specie di beni preziosi e gradevoli.
word.german1912: Durch ordentliches Haushalten werden die Kammern voll aller köstlichen, lieblichen Reichtümer.
word.french1910: C'est par la science que les chambres se remplissent De tous les biens précieux et agréables.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 並且藉著知識，各房間充滿各樣寶貴和美好的財物。
word.korean: 또 방들은 지식으로 말미암아 각종 귀하고 아름다운 보배로 채우게 되느니라
word.tagalog: At sa pamamagitan ng kaalaman ay napupuno ang mga silid, ng lahat na mahalaga at maligayang mga kayamanan.
word.maori: Ma te mohio hoki ka ki ai nga ruma i nga taonga utu nui katoa, i nga mea ahuareka.
word.cebuano: Ug pinaagi sa kahibalo nangapuno ang mga lawak Sa tanang mga bililhon ug makalilipay nga mga bahandi.
word.hebrew: ד  ובדעת חדרים ימלאו--    כל-הון יקר ונעים
word.hebrewmodern: ובדעת חדרים ימלאו כל הון יקר ונעים׃
word.greekot: μετὰ αἰσθήσεως ἐμπίμπλαται ταμίεια ἐκ παντὸς πλούτου τιμίου καὶ καλοῦ

word.kjv: A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength.
word.thailand: คนฉลาดมีกำลังมาก และคนมีความรู้ก็เพิ่มกำลังขึ้น
word.spanish1909: El hombre sabio es fuerte; Y de pujante vigor el hombre docto.
word.latinvulgate: Vir sapiens fortis est, et vir doctus robustus et validus ;
word.italian1927: L’uomo savio è pien di forza, e chi ha conoscimento accresce la sua potenza;
word.german1912: Ein weiser Mann ist stark, und ein vernünftiger Mann ist mächtig von Kräften.
word.french1910: Un homme sage est plein de force, Et celui qui a de la science affermit sa vigueur;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人大有能力，有知識的人力上加力。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자는 강하고 지식 있는 자는 힘을 더하나니
word.tagalog: Ang pantas na tao ay malakas; Oo, ang taong maalam ay lumalago ang kapangyarihan.
word.maori: He kaha te tangata whakaaro nui; ae, e whakanuia ana e te tangata mohio te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawo nga manggialamon kusganon man; Oo, ang usa ka tawo sa kahibalo magauswag sa kagahum.
word.hebrew: ה  גבר-חכם בעוז    ואיש-דעת מאמץ-כח
word.hebrewmodern: גבר חכם בעוז ואיש דעת מאמץ כח׃
word.greekot: κρείσσων σοφὸς ἰσχυροῦ καὶ ἀνὴρ φρόνησιν ἔχων γεωργίου μεγάλου

word.kjv: So shall the knowledge of wisdom be unto thy soul: when thou hast found it, then there shall be a reward, and thy expectation shall not be cut off.
word.thailand: การรู้จักปัญญาก็เป็นเช่นนั้นแก่วิญญาณของเจ้า เมื่อเจ้าพบปัญญาก็จะมีบำเหน็จ และความคาดหวังของเจ้าจะไม่ถูกตัดออก
word.spanish1909: Tal será el conocimiento de la sabiduría á tu alma: Si la hallares tendrá recompensa, Y al fin tu esperanza no será cortada.
word.latinvulgate: Sic et doctrina sapientiæ animæ tuæ ; quam cum inveneris, habebis in novissimis spem, et spes tua non peribit.
word.italian1927: Così conosci la sapienza per il bene dell’anima tua! Se la trovi, c’è un avvenire, e la speranza tua non sarà frustrata.
word.german1912: Also lerne die Weisheit für deine Seele. Wo du sie findest, so wird's hernach wohl gehen, und deine Hoffnung wird nicht umsonst sein.
word.french1910: De même, connais la sagesse pour ton âme; Si tu la trouves, il est un avenir, Et ton espérance ne sera pas anéantie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 要知道智慧對你的心也是這樣，如果你得著智慧，就必有好結局，你的盼望也不會斷絕。
word.korean: 지혜가 네 영혼에게 이와 같은 줄을 알라 이것을 얻으면 정녕히 네 장래가 있겠고 네 소망이 끊어지지 아니하리라
word.tagalog: Sa gayo'y matututo ka ng karunungan na malalagay sa iyong kaluluwa: kung iyong nasumpungan ito, sa gayo'y magkakaroon ka nga ng kagantihan, at ang iyong pagasa ay hindi mahihiwalay.
word.maori: Ka mohio ai koe ki te whakaaro nui, he mea ki tou wairua: ki te kitea e koe, he tukunga iho ano tona, e kore hoki tau i tumanako ai e hatepea.
word.cebuano: Sa ingon niini ikaw mahibalo ug kaalam nga modangat sa imong kalag; Kong ikaw makakaplag niini, nan adunay usa ka balus, Ug ang imong paglaum dili makawang.
word.hebrew: יד  כן דעה חכמה--לנפשך    אם-מצאת ויש אחרית ותקותך לא תכרת
word.hebrewmodern: כן דעה חכמה לנפשך אם מצאת ויש אחרית ותקותך לא תכרת׃
word.greekot: οὕτως αἰσθήσῃ σοφίαν τῇ σῇ ψυχῇ ἐὰν γὰρ εὕρῃς ἔσται καλὴ ἡ τελευτή σου καὶ ἐλπίς σε οὐκ ἐγκαταλείψει

word.kjv: For the transgression of a land many are the princes thereof: but by a man of understanding and knowledge the state thereof shall be prolonged.
word.thailand: เมื่อแผ่นดินละเมิดก็มีผู้ครอบครองเพิ่มขึ้น แต่ด้วยคนที่มีความเข้าใจและความรู้ เสถียรภาพของแผ่นดินนั้นจะยั่งยืนนาน
word.spanish1909: Por la rebelión de la tierra sus príncipes son muchos: Mas por el hombre entendido y sabio permanecerá sin mutación.
word.latinvulgate: Propter peccata terræ multi principes ejus ; et propter hominis sapientiam, et horum scientiam quæ dicuntur, vita ducis longior erit.
word.italian1927: Per i suoi misfatti i capi d’un paese son numerosi, ma, con un uomo intelligente e pratico delle cose, l’ordine dura.
word.german1912: Um des Landes Sünde willen werden viel Änderungen der Fürstentümer; aber um der Leute willen, die verständig und vernünftig sind, bleiben sie lange.
word.french1910: Quand un pays est en révolte, les chefs sont nombreux; Mais avec un homme qui a de l'intelligence et de la science, Le règne se prolonge.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 國家因有過犯，領袖就經常更換；依賴聰明知識俱備的人，國家才可以長存。
word.korean: 나라는 죄가 있으면 주관자가 많아져도 명철과 지식 있는 사람으로 말미암아 장구하게 되느니라
word.tagalog: Dahil sa pagsalangsang ng lupain ay marami ang kaniyang mga pangulo: nguni't sa naguunawa at matalino ay malalaon ang kalagayan niya.
word.maori: ¶ He he no tetahi whenua i tokomaha ai ona rangatira; na kia ai he tangata e mahara ana, e matau ana, ka mau roa ai tona ahua.
word.cebuano: Kay sa kalapasan sa usa ka yuta daghanan ang mga principe niana; Apan pinaagi sa mga tawo nga may salabutan ug kahibalo ang kahimtang niini pagalugwayan.
word.hebrew: ב  בפשע ארץ רבים שריה    ובאדם מבין ידע כן יאריך
word.hebrewmodern: בפשע ארץ רבים שריה ובאדם מבין ידע כן יאריך׃
word.greekot: δι' ἁμαρτίας ἀσεβῶν κρίσεις ἐγείρονται ἀνὴρ δὲ πανοῦργος κατασβέσει αὐτάς

word.kjv: I neither learned wisdom, nor have the knowledge of the holy.
word.thailand: ข้าไม่เคยเรียนรู้ปัญญา ทั้งไม่มีความรู้ขององค์ผู้บริสุทธิ์
word.spanish1909: Yo ni aprendí sabiduría, Ni conozco la ciencia del Santo.
word.latinvulgate: Non didici sapientiam, et non novi scientiam sanctorum.
word.italian1927: Non ho imparato la sapienza, e non ho la conoscenza del Santo.
word.german1912: ich habe Weisheit nicht gelernt, daß ich den Heiligen erkennete.
word.french1910: Je n'ai pas appris la sagesse, Et je ne connais pas la science des saints.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我沒有學習智慧，也不曉得有關至聖者的知識。
word.korean: 나는 지혜를 배우지 못하였고 또 거룩하신 자를 아는 지식이 없거니와
word.tagalog: At hindi ako natuto ng karunungan, ni mayroon man ako ng kaalaman ng Banal.
word.maori: Kihai hoki ahau i whakaakona ki te whakaaro nui, kihai ano i mohio ki te Mea Tapu.
word.cebuano: Ug ako wala makakat-on sa kaalam, Ni may kahibalo ako sa Usa nga Balaan.
word.hebrew: ג  ולא-למדתי חכמה    ודעת קדשים אדע
word.hebrewmodern: ולא למדתי חכמה ודעת קדשים אדע׃
word.greekot: θεὸς δεδίδαχέν με σοφίαν καὶ γνῶσιν ἁγίων ἔγνωκα

word.kjv: I communed with mine own heart, saying, Lo, I am come to great estate, and have gotten more wisdom than all they that have been before me in Jerusalem: yea, my heart had great experience of wisdom and knowledge.
word.thailand: ข้าพเจ้ารำพึงในใจของข้าพเจ้าว่า "ดูเถิด ข้าพเจ้าได้มาถึงฐานะที่สูงส่ง และได้มีสติปัญญามากกว่าใครๆที่เคยอยู่ในกรุงเยรูซาเล็มก่อนข้าพเจ้า เออ ใจข้าพเจ้าก็เจนจัดในสติปัญญาและความรู้อย่างยิ่ง"
word.spanish1909: Hablé yo con mi corazón, diciendo: He aquí hállome yo engrandecido, y he crecido en sabiduría sobre todos los que fueron antes de mí en Jerusalem; y mi corazón ha percibido muchedumbre de sabiduría y ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Locutus sum in corde meo, dicens : Ecce magnus effectus sum, et præcessi omnes sapientia qui fuerunt ante me in Jerusalem ; et mens mea contemplata est multa sapienter, et didici.
word.italian1927: Io ho detto, parlando in cuor mio: "Ecco io ho acquistato maggior sapienza di tutti quelli che hanno regnato prima di me in Gerusalemme"; sì, il mio cuore ha posseduto molta sapienza e molta scienza.
word.german1912: Ich sprach in meinem Herzen: Siehe, ich bin herrlich geworden und habe mehr Weisheit denn alle, die vor mir gewesen sind zu Jerusalem, und mein Herz hat viel gelernt und erfahren. {~}
word.french1910: J'ai dit en mon coeur: Voici, j'ai grandi et surpassé en sagesse tous ceux qui ont dominé avant moi sur Jérusalem, et mon coeur a vu beaucoup de sagesse et de science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我自己心裡說：“我得了極大的智慧，勝過所有在我以前統治耶路撒冷的人；我見識了許多智慧與知識。”
word.korean: 내가 마음 가운데 말하여 이르기를 내가 큰 지혜를 많이 얻었으므로 나보다 먼저 예루살렘에 있던 자보다 낫다 하였나니 곧 내 마음이 지혜와 지식을 많이 만나 보았음이로다
word.tagalog: Ako'y sumangguni sa aking sariling puso, na sinasabi ko, Narito, nagtamo ako sa akin ng malaking karunungan ng higit kay sa lahat na nauna sa akin sa Jerusalem: oo, ang puso ko'y nagtaglay ng malaking kabihasnan sa karunungan at kaalaman.
word.maori: I korerorero ahau ki toku ngakau, i mea, Nana, kua whiwhi rawa ahau i te whakaaro nui ki runga ake i o te hunga katoa i mua atu i ahau i Hiruharama: ae ra, he maha nga mea kua kitea e toku ngakau o te whakaaro nui, o te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ako nakigsulti sa akong kaugalingong kasingkasing, nga nagaingon: Ania karon, nakabaton ako ug dakung kaalam labaw niadtong tanan nga nanghiuna kanako sa Jerusalem; oo, ang akong kasingkasing may dakung kasinatian sa kaalam ug kahibalo.
word.hebrew: טז דברתי אני עם לבי לאמר--אני הנה הגדלתי והוספתי חכמה על כל אשר היה לפני על ירושלם ולבי ראה הרבה חכמה ודעת
word.hebrewmodern: דברתי אני עם לבי לאמר אני הנה הגדלתי והוספתי חכמה על כל אשר היה לפני על ירושלם ולבי ראה הרבה חכמה ודעת׃
word.greekot: ἐλάλησα ἐγὼ ἐν καρδίᾳ μου τῷ λέγειν ἐγὼ ἰδοὺ ἐμεγαλύνθην καὶ προσέθηκα σοφίαν ἐπὶ πᾶσιν οἳ ἐγένοντο ἔμπροσθέν μου ἐν ιερουσαλημ καὶ καρδία μου εἶδεν πολλά σοφίαν καὶ γνῶσιν

word.kjv: For in much wisdom is much grief: and he that increaseth knowledge increaseth sorrow.
word.thailand: เพราะในสติปัญญามากๆก็มีความทุกข์ระทมมาก และบุคคลที่เพิ่มความรู้ก็เพิ่มความเศร้าโศก
word.spanish1909: Porque en la mucha sabiduría hay mucha molestia; y quien añade ciencia, añade dolor.
word.latinvulgate: eo quod in multa sapientia multa sit indignatio ; et qui addit scientiam, addit et laborem.
word.italian1927: Poiché dov’è molta sapienza v’è molto affanno, e chi accresce la sua scienza accresce il suo dolore.
word.german1912: Denn wo viel Weisheit ist, da ist viel Grämens; und wer viel lernt, der muß viel leiden.
word.french1910: Car avec beaucoup de sagesse on a beaucoup de chagrin, et celui qui augmente sa science augmente sa douleur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為多有智慧，就多有煩惱；加增知識，就加增痛苦。
word.korean: 지혜가 많으면 번뇌도 많으니 지식을 더하는 자는 근심을 더하느니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sa maraming karunungan at maraming kapanglawan: at siyang nananagana sa kaalaman ay nananagana sa kapanglawan.
word.maori: Ma te nui hoki o te whakaaro ka nui ai te pouri: a ko te tangata e whakaneke ake ana i te matauranga e whakaneke ake ana i te mamae.
word.cebuano: Kay diha sa hilabihan nga kaalam anaa ang hilabihang kasakit; ug kadtong nagapadugang sa kahibalo nagapadugang sa kasubo.
word.hebrew: יח כי ברב חכמה רב כעס ויוסיף דעת יוסיף מכאוב
word.hebrewmodern: כי ברב חכמה רב כעס ויוסיף דעת יוסיף מכאוב׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐν πλήθει σοφίας πλῆθος γνώσεως καὶ ὁ προστιθεὶς γνῶσιν προσθήσει ἄλγημα

word.kjv: For there is a man whose labour is in wisdom, and in knowledge, and in equity; yet to a man that hath not laboured therein shall he leave it for his portion. This also is vanity and a great evil.
word.thailand: ด้วยว่ามีคนที่ทำงานโดยใช้สติปัญญา ความรู้ และความชำนาญ แต่แล้วก็ละการนั้นให้เป็นส่วนของอีกคนหนึ่งที่หาได้ออกแรงทำเพื่อการนั้นไม่ นี่ก็อนิจจังด้วยและสามานย์ยิ่ง
word.spanish1909: Que el hombre trabaje con sabiduría, y con ciencia, y con rectitud, y que haya de dar su hacienda á hombre que nunca trabajó en ello! También es esto vanidad y mal grande.
word.latinvulgate: Nam cum alius laboret in sapientia, et doctrina, et sollicitudine, homini otioso quæsita dimittit ; et hoc ergo vanitas et magnum malum.
word.italian1927: Poiché, ecco un uomo che ha lavorato con saviezza, con intelligenza e con successo e lascia il frutto del suo lavoro in eredità a un altro, che non v’ha speso intorno alcuna fatica! Anche questo è vanità, e un male grande.
word.german1912: Denn es muß ein Mensch, der seine Arbeit mit Weisheit, Vernunft und Geschicklichkeit getan hat, sie einem andern zum Erbteil lassen, der nicht daran gearbeitet hat. Das ist auch eitel und ein großes Unglück.
word.french1910: Car tel homme a travaillé avec sagesse et science et avec succès, et il laisse le produit de son travail à un homme qui ne s'en est point occupé. C'est encore là une vanité et un grand mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為人用智慧、知識和技能所勞碌得來的，卻必須留給未曾勞碌的人為分。這也是虛空，是極大的憾事。
word.korean: 어떤 사람은 그 지혜와 지식과 재주를 써서 수고하였어도 그 얻은 것을 수고하지 아니한 자에게 업으로 끼치리니 이것도 헛된 것이라 큰 해로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't may tao, na ang gawa ay sa pamamagitan ng karunungan, at ng kaalaman, at ng kabihasnan; gayon ma'y sa tao na hindi gumawa niyaon ay iiwan niya na pinakabahagi niyaon. Ito man ay walang kabuluhan at malaking kasamaan.
word.maori: Tenei hoki tetahi tangata kei runga nei i te whakaaro nui tana mahi, kei runga i te matauranga, kei runga i te mohio; otiia ka waiho e ia hei wahi ma te tangata kihai nei i mahi. He horihori ano tenei, he he nui.
word.cebuano: Kay adunay tawo kansang buhat inubanan sa kaalam, ug inubanan sa kahibalo, ug inubanan sa pagkabatid; apan kini igabilin niya sa tawo nga wala makabuhat niana ingon nga iyang panulondon. Kini usab kakawangan ug usa ka dakung kadautan.
word.hebrew: כא כי יש אדם שעמלו בחכמה ובדעת--ובכשרון ולאדם שלא עמל בו יתננו חלקו--גם זה הבל ורעה רבה
word.hebrewmodern: כי יש אדם שעמלו בחכמה ובדעת ובכשרון ולאדם שלא עמל בו יתננו חלקו גם זה הבל ורעה רבה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἔστιν ἄνθρωπος οὗ μόχθος αὐτοῦ ἐν σοφίᾳ καὶ ἐν γνώσει καὶ ἐν ἀνδρείᾳ καὶ ἄνθρωπος ὃς οὐκ ἐμόχθησεν ἐν αὐτῷ δώσει αὐτῷ μερίδα αὐτοῦ καί γε τοῦτο ματαιότης καὶ πονηρία μεγάλη

word.kjv: For God giveth to a man that is good in his sight wisdom, and knowledge, and joy: but to the sinner he giveth travail, to gather and to heap up, that he may give to him that is good before God. This also is vanity and vexation of spirit.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าพระเจ้าประทานสติปัญญา ความรู้ และความยินดีให้แก่คนที่พระองค์ทรงพอพระทัยในสายพระเนตรของพระองค์ แต่ส่วนคนบาปนั้นพระองค์ประทานความเหนื่อยยากในการรวบรวมและสะสมให้เพิ่มพูน เพื่อว่าเขาจะได้มอบให้แก่ผู้ที่พอพระทัยต่อพระพักตร์พระเจ้า นี่ก็เป็นความว่างเปล่าและความวุ่นวายใจด้วย
word.spanish1909: Porque al hombre que le agrada, Dios le da sabiduría y ciencia y gozo, mas al pecador da trabajo, el que allegue y amontone, para que dé al que agrada á Dios. También esto es vanidad y aflicción de espíritu.
word.latinvulgate: Homini bono in conspectu suo dedit Deus sapientiam, et scientiam, et lætitiam ; peccatori autem dedit afflictionem et curam superfluam, ut addat, et congreget, et tradat ei qui placuit Deo ; sed et hoc vanitas est, et cassa sollicitudo mentis.
word.italian1927: Poiché Iddio dà all’uomo ch’egli gradisce, sapienza, intelligenza e gioia; ma al peccatore dà la cura di raccogliere, d’accumulare, per lasciar poi tutto a colui ch’è gradito agli occhi di Dio. Anche questo è vanità e un correre dietro al vento.
word.german1912: Denn dem Menschen, der ihm gefällt, gibt er Weisheit, Vernunft und Freude; aber dem Sünder gibt er Mühe, daß er sammle und häufe, und es doch dem gegeben werde, der Gott gefällt. Darum ist das auch eitel und Haschen nach dem Wind. {~}
word.french1910: Car il donne à l'homme qui lui est agréable la sagesse, la science et la joie; mais il donne au pécheur le soin de recueillir et d'amasser, afin de donner à celui qui est agréable à Dieu. C'est encore là une vanité et la poursuite du vent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 神把智慧、知識和喜樂賜給他所喜悅的人，卻使罪人作收集和積聚的差事，把所得的歸給　神所喜悅的人。這也是虛空，也是捕風。
word.korean: 하나님이 그 기뻐하시는 자에게는 지혜와 지식과 희락을 주시나 죄인에게는 노고를 주시고 저로 모아 쌓게 하사 하나님을 기뻐하는 자에게 주게 하시나니 이것도 헛되어 바람을 잡으려는 것이로다
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang tao na kinaluluguran niya, binibigyan ng Dios ng karunungan, at kaalaman, at kagalakan: nguni't ang makasalanan ay binibigyan niya ng damdam, na magpisan at magbunton, upang maibigay sa kaniya na kinaluluguran ng Dios. Ito man ay walang kabuluhan at nauuwi sa wala.
word.maori: Ki te tangata hoki e pai ana ki to te Atua aroaro e homai ana e ia he whakaaro nui, he matauranga, he koa; ki te tangata hara ia e homai ana e ia he raruraru, ki te kohikohi, ki te amene mea mai, hei hoatutanga mana ki te tangata e pai ana ki to te Atua aroaro. He horihori ano hoki tenei, he whai i te hau.
word.cebuano: Kay sa tawo nga makapahimuot kaniya, ang Dios nagahatag ug kaalam, ug kahibalo, ug kalipay; apan sa makasasala, siya nagahatag ug kasakit, aron tigumon ug pundokon, aron ihatag kini niadtong nagapahimuot sa Dios. Kini usab kakawangan man ug mao ang paghakop ug hangin.
word.hebrew: כו כי לאדם שטוב לפניו נתן חכמה ודעת ושמחה ולחוטא נתן ענין לאסף ולכנוס לתת לטוב לפני האלהים--גם זה הבל ורעות רוח
word.hebrewmodern: כי לאדם שטוב לפניו נתן חכמה ודעת ושמחה ולחוטא נתן ענין לאסוף ולכנוס לתת לטוב לפני האלהים גם זה הבל ורעות רוח׃
word.greekot: ὅτι τῷ ἀνθρώπῳ τῷ ἀγαθῷ πρὸ προσώπου αὐτοῦ ἔδωκεν σοφίαν καὶ γνῶσιν καὶ εὐφροσύνην καὶ τῷ ἁμαρτάνοντι ἔδωκεν περισπασμὸν τοῦ προσθεῖναι καὶ τοῦ συναγαγεῖν τοῦ δοῦναι τῷ ἀγαθῷ πρὸ προσώπου τοῦ θεοῦ ὅτι καί γε τοῦτο ματαιότης καὶ προαίρεσις πνεύματος

word.kjv: For wisdom is a defence, and money is a defence: but the excellency of knowledge is, that wisdom giveth life to them that have it.
word.thailand: เงินเป็นเครื่องป้องกันฉันใด สติปัญญาก็เป็นเครื่องป้องกันฉันนั้น และผลประโยชน์ของความรู้ คือสติปัญญาย่อมรักษาชีวิตของผู้ที่มีสติปัญญานั้น
word.spanish1909: Porque escudo es la ciencia, y escudo es el dinero: mas la sabiduría excede en que da vida á sus poseedores.
word.latinvulgate: Utilior est sapientia cum divitiis, et magis prodest videntibus solem.
word.italian1927: Poiché la sapienza offre un riparo, come l’offre il danaro; ma l’eccellenza della scienza sta in questo, che la sapienza fa vivere quelli che la possiedono.
word.german1912: Denn die Weisheit beschirmt, so beschirmt Geld auch; aber die Weisheit gibt das Leben dem, der sie hat. {~}
word.french1910: Car à l'ombre de la sagesse on est abrité comme à l'ombre de l'argent; mais un avantage de la science, c'est que la sagesse fait vivre ceux qui la possèdent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為受智慧的庇護，如同受銀子的庇護。唯有智慧能保全智慧人的生命，這就是知識的益處。
word.korean: 지혜도 보호하는 것이 되고 돈도 보호하는 것이 되나 지식이 더욱 아름다움은 지혜는 지혜 얻은 자의 생명을 보존함이니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't ang karunungan ay sanggalang, sa makatuwid baga'y gaya ng salapi na sanggalang: nguni't ang karilagan ng kaalaman, ay iniingatan ng karunungan ang buhay niya na nagtatangkilik niyaon.
word.maori: Hei whakamarumaru iho te whakaaro nui, hei pera hoki i te moni te whakamarumaru: ko te pai ia o te matauranga koia tenei, ka ora i te whakaaro nui nga tangata nana.
word.cebuano: Kay ang kaalam maoy usa ka panagang maingon nga ang salapi usa ka panagang man: apan ang pagkahalangdon sa kahibalo mao, kana nga kaalam nagabantay sa kinabuhi niadtong nagabaton niini.
word.hebrew: יב כי בצל החכמה בצל הכסף ויתרון דעת החכמה תחיה בעליה
word.hebrewmodern: כי בצל החכמה בצל הכסף ויתרון דעת החכמה תחיה בעליה׃
word.greekot: ὅτι ἐν σκιᾷ αὐτῆς ἡ σοφία ὡς σκιὰ τοῦ ἀργυρίου καὶ περισσεία γνώσεως τῆς σοφίας ζωοποιήσει τὸν παρ' αὐτῆς

word.kjv: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.
word.thailand: มือของเจ้าจับทำการงานอะไร จงกระทำการนั้นด้วยเต็มกำลังของเจ้า เพราะว่าในแดนคนตายที่เจ้าจะไปนั้นไม่มีการงาน หรือแนวความคิด หรือความรู้ หรือสติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: Todo lo que te viniere á la mano para hacer, hazlo según tus fuerzas; porque en el sepulcro, adonde tú vas, no hay obra, ni industria, ni ciencia, ni sabiduría.
word.latinvulgate: Quodcumque facere potest manus tua, instanter operare, quia nec opus, nec ratio, nec sapientia, nec scientia erunt apud inferos, quo tu properas.
word.italian1927: Tutto quello che la tua mano trova da fare, fallo con tutte le tue forze; poiché nel soggiorno de’ morti dove vai, non v’è più né lavoro, né pensiero, né scienza, né sapienza.
word.german1912: Alles, was dir vor Handen kommt, zu tun, das tue frisch; denn bei den Toten, dahin du fährst, ist weder Werk, Kunst, Vernunft noch Weisheit.
word.french1910: Tout ce que ta main trouve à faire avec ta force, fais-le; car il n'y a ni oeuvre, ni pensée, ni science, ni sagesse, dans le séjour des morts, où tu vas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡是你手可作的，都當盡力去作；因為在你所要去的陰間裡，既沒有工作，又沒有籌謀；沒有知識，也沒有智慧。
word.korean: 무릇 네 손이 일을 당하는대로 힘을 다하여 할찌어다 네가 장차 들어갈 음부에는 일도 없고 계획도 없고 지식도 없고 지혜도 없음이니라
word.tagalog: Anomang masumpungang gawain ng iyong kamay, gawin mo ng iyong kapangyarihan; sapagka't walang gawa, ni katha man, ni kaalaman man, ni karunungan man, sa Sheol, na iyong pinaparunan.
word.maori: Ko nga mea katoa e kitea e tou ringa kia mahia, kia puta tou uaua ki te mahi; kahore hoki he mahi, kahore he tikanga, kahore he matauranga, kahore he whakaaro nui i te reinga, i te wahi ka haere atu na koe ki reira.
word.cebuano: Bisan unsa ang hikaplagan nga buhat sa imong kamot, buhata kana uban ang imong kusog; kay didto sa Sheol diin ikaw moadto walay bulohaton, ni lalang, ni kahibalo, ni kaalam.
word.hebrew: י כל אשר תמצא ידך לעשות בכחך--עשה  כי אין מעשה וחשבון ודעת וחכמה בשאול אשר אתה הלך שמה  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: כל אשר תמצא ידך לעשות בכחך עשה כי אין מעשה וחשבון ודעת וחכמה בשאול אשר אתה הלך שמה׃
word.greekot: πάντα ὅσα ἂν εὕρῃ ἡ χείρ σου τοῦ ποιῆσαι ὡς ἡ δύναμίς σου ποίησον ὅτι οὐκ ἔστιν ποίημα καὶ λογισμὸς καὶ γνῶσις καὶ σοφία ἐν ᾅδῃ ὅπου σὺ πορεύῃ ἐκεῖ

word.kjv: And moreover, because the preacher was wise, he still taught the people knowledge; yea, he gave good heed, and sought out, and set in order many proverbs.
